Job Description: • Responsible for the management of the construction team including mentoring, scheduling their activities, recruitment and performance management of the team members.• Directing the construction team through all construction phases of a project including contractor coordination and all aspects of site management.• Check and ensure the project brief, all design briefs, drawings and specifications and all project relevant information are executed as per clients objectives.• Contact with Suppliers of Construction materials/equipment in order to be aware of the most efficient & cost effective application and working methods.• Monitoring construction progress, quality and safety, and initiating action to rectify any non-conformance.• Supervise onsite contractor(s) for their safety, quality, equipment and maintenance of appropriate resourcing levels.• Writing & submitting weekly construction reports, providing all relevant information to the project manager.• Monitoring the preparation of contractors final accounts obtaining relevant certificates and submission to the client for payment.• Ensuring the inclusion in the contract and subsequently requesting the design team, consultants and contractors to supply the client with as-built and installed drawings, operations and maintenance manuals, as well as ensuring adequate arrangements have been made for training of clients engineering and maintenance staff.• Cease contractors from continuing work if concerns are identified with safety, quality, method statements or any other non-conformance.• Recruitment decisions for construction team members for a small project and within the Limitations of Authority Policy of the Archetype Group. Assisting Project Manager on recruitment decision on a larger project.• Overall construction site management, highlighting any issues with site management to the Project Manager, leading construction meetings & writing minutes of meeting.
Job Requirement: • Advanced technical abilities in construction management, with the ability to train and mentor others to develop further their skills in contractor management, safety, quality management, and site-based design management.• Advanced attention to detail, particularly in respect to contractual requirements, design/site drawings, quality of construction works and construction standard methods.• Advanced written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to write clear reports, site instructions/memos and meeting minutes that are clear and understandable.• Previous experience managing multicultural project teams in an expatriate environment either in Asia, the Middle East, Africa or South America.• Intermediate leadership skills, ensuring teams are well motivated, organized, able to provide clear direction and manage conflict.• Intermediate client management skills, including demonstrable persuasiveness, negotiation skills and inter-personal skills.• Intermediate working knowledge of software used in project management including: Microsoft Project, Primavera, Team Binder, Excel and the Microsoft Office Suite.• Fluency in written and spoken English is a pre-requisite.• Bachelor degree in engineering or equivalent: minimum 3 years of study.• Major: project management or civil engineering.• Seniority: more than 15 years of working on construction projects. • Management experience: a minimum of 12 years’ experience managing construction teams. • Experience in high rise construction.

Job Description:
Customer Service
- Support cargo reservations and bookings whilst providing exemplary customer service
- Provide timely vendor notification for on time and delayed flights
- Provide timely shipment status updates to customers
- Help to manage Ground Handling Agent performance and provide guidelines and instructions
- Support the established performance targets through operational oversight and participation

Administrative Support

- Prepare flight documentation for crew and Customs
- Check and review post flight documentation
- Prepare post flight reports in a timely and accurate manner
- Provide freighter catering uplift and last minute changes
- Coordinate effectively between engineering, airport operations, air traffic control and vendors to ensure smooth communication and service provision
- Coordinate cargo service activities between sales, operations and ground handling in order to ensure efficient handling of shipments
- Communicate effectively via various channels stakeholders including customers, airport and cargo operations, suppliers, flight crew etc.
- Assist with various administrative station tasks such as SAP
- Coordinate weather diversions at diversion sites
- Handle diversion of Cathay Pacific Flights when required
- Assist with crew administration and support matters at the port
- Support station training activities as required
- Support station management in supplier oversight including reporting Ground Handling Agent performance issues
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Ramp Coordinator 

- Monitor and ensure the required procedures are properly carried out by Ramp Handling Operator and the Cargo Terminal Operator particularly for special cargo, movement of in/out cargo and mail units on an ad-hoc basis, loading and unloading of freighter, etc.
- Monitor the optimisation of space utilisation for loaded Unit Load Devices and the belly of freighters
- Ensure aircraft searches required by the Security Programme are conducted prior to loading
- Maintain good communications with captain-in-command, Ramp - Handling Operator, Cargo Terminal Operator and the Cargo Office
- Liaise closely with the Cargo Office to provide up to date information of freighter positioning when there is disruption of schedule
- Quickly resolve issues on the ramp as required
- Ensure safe operations are maintained at times particularly during loading and unloading of freighters
- Assess the cause of any delay and provide recommendations to the immediate supervisor on accountability for the cause and solution
- Monitor the acceptance and release of such special cargo as animals, engine, vehicle, bulky shipment, and odd-sized items
- Coordinate the activities in the warehouse and conduct quality checks on cargo handling from the Cargo Terminal Operator and the Ramp Handling Operator
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Safety, Security and Compliance

- Help to ensure compliance and conformance to all regulatory and internal safety, security, quality, and procedural requirements
- Undertake quality check programmes established by Head Office and participate in audits as required
- Support the Emergency and Accident role as required
- May be designated Operational Duty Holder for the station as required
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree graduation: Knowledge, Skills, Training and Experience
- Minimum 2 years’ experience in the cargo industry is an advantage
- Strong communication skills
- Natural customer service orientation
- Attentive to detail
- Knowledge of MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint

Job Description: - Designs and layout of electronic and print materials for Aii, CSL Program, TESOL House programs and events (poster, banner, logos, invitations, postcards, name cards, etc.) - Designs graphic related to Aii, CSL Program and TESOL House.- Assists Aii, CSL Program & TESOL House Sales and Marketing Team with creative concepts for both online and on ground marketing.- Works closely with Aii, MJQCLC & TESOL House Web Developer. - Plans concept by studying information and materials.- Illustrates concept by designing rough layout of art and copy regarding arrangement, size, type size and style, and related aesthetic concepts.- Be able to think digital and design for blog, social media, emailers, web banners, ad campaigns and videos- Completes projects by coordinating with requesters. - Maintains technical knowledge by attending design workshops; reviewing professional publications; participating in professional societies.- Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.- Collects and archive all the completed tasks.- Prepares final layout by marking and pasting up finished copy and art.- Obtains approval of concept by submitting rough layout for approval.- Shoots and records videos of interviews and school events for Aii Language Centers.- Organizes digital footage with video-editing software.- Reviews storyline and script to create a shot decision list based on scene value.- Collaborates with the director and others who are involved in film making.- Completes other tasks assigned by Aii Committee.
Job Requirement: - A bachelor degree in Information Technology or related fields.- Computer Knowledge- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative - Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in EnglishHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description: Purpose (Describe the scope of work for this position to be covered) Accounting Manager Managing and overseeing the daily operations of the accounting department; monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports or statements and establishing and enforcing proper accounting methods, policies and principles Expected Result (Describe the expected result for this position to be achieved)• Produce financial report or statement• Establishing & enforcing proper accounting method, policies and principle• Managing and overseeing daily operations of accounting department Main Tasks (Describe the main tasks to be completed)• Oversee and manage the general accounting functions, including : accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and taxes.• Overseeing the daily activities of the accounting department and ensuring that all major projects, month-end, and year-end reports are completed accurately and on time.• Assess current practices and procedures and make recommendations for improvements.• Develop staff by managing performance, setting goals, providing ongoing training, and maintaining strong employee relationships.• Verify payments before processing for cash disbursements.• Manage account receivables, account payables ,Bank reconciliation, fixed assets register, and cash flows• Preparing and reviewing financial budget plan.• Sign acknowledged on journal voucher before submitting to GM• Initiate more or new controls when there is weakness or e risk in current practices• Monitors and analyzes department work to develop more efficient procedures and use of resources while maintaining a high level of accuracy.• Prepare for internal financial audit and coordinate the audit process.• Assess staff performance, effectively communicate with them, and maintain a positive working relationship when addressing problems and coming up with solutions• Handle personnel issues relating to staff conflicts, performance issues, etc.• Liaise between staffs and management• Provide training both soft and hard skill to team.• Other tasks assigned by GM.
Job Requirement: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Accounting or Finance. CPA or MBA preferred.• Advanced Microsoft Excel skills. Experience with other financial systems.• 5+ years of progressive accounting experience with a portion of it being in a supervisory role• Good in English speaking and writing.• Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively in a complex environment.• Attention to detail and the ability to analyze large amounts of data.• Excellent verbal and written communication abilities across all levels of an organization• Strong leadership skills with a dedication to driving and achieving results• Knowledge of employee relationship building and performance management techniques Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within deadline.

Job Description:
- Transaction Processing and Reporting:
- Conduct daily verification between incoming and outgoing transactions related to bank account statement and the transactions posted in SAP system 
- Post transactions from/to various third-party payment system in proper bank account codes in SAP system in accordance to its value date
- Prepare report and do reconciliation of all incoming and/or outgoing bank/cash/cheque related transactions for the supervisor
- Perform relevant tasks to create/suspend/close bank/cash general ledger in SAP system in accordance to the approval obtained
- Conduct daily/weekly/monthly reconciliation between transactions in SAP and transactions in the bank account statement
- Verify cash and cheque transaction journal entry with cash/bank balance and real cash
- Prepare appropriate documents for bank account opening and closing, loan documents and liaise with banks for loan drawdown
- Post all bank/cash related transactions in conjunction with loan, trade finance, and any off-balance sheet items related to treasury
Job Requirement:
- Associate or bachelor's degree in accounting and Finance or a related field
- At least 1 years of experience in Finance, Accounting, Business, Treasury, Banking, or a related area.
- Knowledge of excel, SAP system, transaction booking, cash management and bank account relationship is a plus
- Strong interpersonal skills, analytical and logical thinking skills
- Demonstrate consistency, pay attention to details and able to work under pressure
- Be a team player with the ability to work independently, self-motivated and performance focused.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
* MISSION
Passerelles numériques Cambodia (PNC) is looking for an External Relations Officer for its External Relations Department. 

S/he will be responsible for company visit management, internship and job placement for students, partnership development, and working on other tasks written down in the section of duties and responsibilities below.


Objectives for external relations 
Increase the partnership opportunity of PN Cambodia with local companies/NGOs in terms of skills sharing, recruitment and sponsorship with the support of External Relations team

* DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Monitor the training delivery 
-	Ensure the delivery of the training curricula
-	Ensure curricula are updated regularly by following up with each coordinator
-	Ensure assessments are completed on time
-	Ensure follow-up of each student’s education (exams, internships, behaviour) in closed relation with the Social Affairs team
-	Coordinate internship program and tutors with the External Relations Manager 
-	Operational management of Training & Education activities: timetable, classrooms, IT labs, class materials and supplies, etc. 
-	Be a strong support to innovation to ensure the quality development of PNC training 

* Manage the Training Team

-	Lead the team (7 trainers, 3 coordinators) and coordinate collaboration amongst them and other departments for innovation; 
-	Supervise the teams in its daily operations (routine, schedules, emergencies...) 
-	Organize team building and coordination meetings; 
-	Ensure the coordination within the team and with other departments to implement processes and decisions with the students and staff; 
-	Ensure that best practices and experiences are shared and capitalized; 
-	Recruit, interview, and hire new training team members with HR officer based on need; 
-	Seek training for staff development, orient new staff. 
-	Coordinate volunteers and create skills-sharing missions for the professional development of the training team. 

* Collaborating with others

-	Play an active role towards the other Passerelles numériques’ teams in Asia, leading or participating to cross-country projects; 
-	Implement decisions and policies given by the Cambodia Country Representative and the local authorities 
-	Develop partnerships with higher institutions that can provide support, expertise and resources for Passerelles numériques’s training mission 
-	Be in charge of the relationship between PNC and the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport and especially Higher Education Department 

* Monitoring and evaluation 

-	Plan the Training Team budgets each year;
-	Approve the purchase request of the training team following the approved budget 
-	Support the other team to report training activities 

* Producing training reports

-	Produce semester training reports (twice a year) to submit to Higher Education Department and CDC
-	Produce training reports for donors as required by the PN Fundraising Team
-	Produce training reports for SDF as required by the External Relations Office Team
-	Produce training report for MoU with Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport as required by the Finance and Admin Team
-	Produce training report for Board of Director as required by the Finance and Admin Team 

* SKILL AND EXPERIENCE

-	MA in Education, Pedagogy, or similar field 
-	At least 2 years professional experience in managing a team 
-	Willing to work in a multicultural environment 
-	High sense of integrity and honesty 
-	Good communication and reporting skills 
-	Sense of initiative, autonomous, creative, open, and critical 
-	Able to work under pressure 
-	Strongly motivated to work for underprivileged young people 
-	English fluency (preferred as it’s the work language) 
* STATUS AND CONDITIONS
-	Unfixed term contract 
-	Multicultural team setting (Khmer, French)
-	Salary negotiated upon experience
-	Performance bonus (one-month salary)
-	Seniority bonus 
-	24 paid leaves per year and seniority leaves 
-	Private health insurance provided 
-	Start date: beginning of February 2022
Job Requirement:
* HOW TO APPLY:

- Interested individuals are invited to submit cover letter and CV (including your expected salary) to email below before 15th January 2022. Telephone: 023 99 55 00

* Passerelles numeriques Cambodia

- Address: BP 511, St. 371, Phum Tropeang Chhuk (Borey Sorla), Sangkat Toek Thla, Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh

- E-mail: jobs.cambodia@passerellesnumeriques.org
- Website: www.passerellesnumeriques.org

Job Description:
•	Organize and lead activities designed to promote physical, mental and social development
•	Teach basic skills such as color, shape, number and letter recognition, personal hygiene, and social skills
•	Observe and evaluate children's performance, behavior, social development, and physical health
•	Provide a variety of materials and resources for children to explore, manipulate and use
•	Assimilate arriving children to the school environment by greeting them, helping them remove outerwear, and selecting activities of interest to them
•	Prepare materials and classrooms for class activities;
•	Establish clear objectives for all lessons and communicate those objectives to children
•	Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students' varying needs and interests
•	Arrange indoor and outdoor space to facilitate creative play, motor-skill activities, and safety
•	Prepare reports on students and activities as required by administration
•	Administer tests to help determine children's developmental levels, needs, and potential
•	Supervise, evaluate, and plan assignments for teacher assistants and volunteers
•	Perform other tasks assigned by upper manager
Job Requirement:
•	At least One-year experience in teaching Chinese
•	Respect and supporting AG Education’s values and mission
•	Six months to one year work-related experience in education
•	Good command of Chinese
•	Computer literacy: Ms. Word, Ms. Excel a plus
•	Good communication, interpersonal, and customer-service skill
•	Ability to create teaching aids
•	Ability to work well independently as well as part of a team
Company Profile: AG Education is a group of educational institutions such as Grand Mount International School and Arizon School. We provide Coeducation (National Curriculum and Singaporean-based Curriculum + Mandarin Chinese)  from early years to years 12 , English language, Chinese language, and Computer.    AG Education is currently looking for many potential candidates to fulfill the following vacancies.

job title: Education &Training Senior Officer at AEON 1 (AEON PHNOM PENH)
position: Education &Training Senior Officer at AEON 1 (AEON PHNOM PENH)
Job Description: Major Duties: •	To implement yearly training program plan in store•	To support oversea training & external training program •	To ensure that all members of staff, new and existing, within the department and external, are trained on the application to an appropriate level. •	To support conduct new staff orientation program for new store opening•	To support TNA to create new course right match to current company situation.•	To maintain effective communication with AEON employees•	To ensure training provision meets customer requirements and is evaluated appropriately.•	To provide high quality professional training courses and materials •	To acquire feedback on the courses needed for future planning/management information.•	To facilitate training materials. •	To design training materials & certificate that reflects company developments.•	Keeping & controlling attendance for all staff by each training course•	To support online learning platform•	To create company manuals with other related department •	To support Best Service Staff, Staff Briefing & Cashier Skill Test..•	To translate company information or announcement assigned by Manager•	To assist room booking system. •	Other duties will be assigned by Management
Job Requirement: . Bachelor Degree of Education or relevant field . Having at least 2 years experience in training •	To provide friendly, courteous and professional service at all times.•	To maintain good working relationships with colleagues and all other departments•	To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required

job title: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271)
position: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To To participate in the recruitment of personnel in an active and optimal manner.
• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Attachments

Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

job title: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271)
position: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Transport Supervisor

** Key Responsibilities:
1. Risk Prevention
- Monitor fleet movement using CCTV footage
- Detect risky behavior, aggressive driving, and fraudulent practices, and take immediate action to stop the event and report to supervisor/transporters.
- Analyzed triggered events on system and take immediate actions with Transporters/ Drivers.
- Coordinate with Transporters in maintaining updated Driver list.
- Register new zones, and drivers into System.
- Coordinate with Transporters, Dispatcher to have faulty equipment repaired/replaced/upgraded.
- Assist with accidents, fraud, and complaints investigation, by collecting all relevant supporting data and footages.
- Conduct random checks on driver teams by calls and/or toolbox meetings.
- Verify driver working/rest time before each trip.
- Promote safety culture and safe practices to Transporters and drivers.

2. Performance Control
- Submit daily reports on Fleet Movement using data retrieved from system.
- Host monthly toolbox meeting / Drivers/Transporters to discuss monthly driver performance and issues and submit the minute of meeting to all relevant stakeholders.
- Assist with driver appraisal preparation, by verifying Transporters’ submitted nominations.
- Summarize monthly driver/transporters violations to supervisor, for review and penalties.
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: IT or Business Administration preferably from Logistics related field
- Experience: Basic understanding of logistic & supply chain in logistic operation, working with OBC (On-Board Computer) system, CCTV, or fleet telematics
- Skills: MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word), E-mail (Outlook), Group Chat Application (Telegram/WhatsApp), Google Map.
- Language: Good proficiency in English both Speaking and Writing

Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

• Sourcing from other sources, purchase goods and services and negotiate for best price and good term of payments
• Cooperate with Shops, Standard Company or wholesale for purchase
• Search for new suppliers, and competitors to compete with existing suppliers
• Prepare Debit note and Credit note
• Cooperate and build good relationship with relevant departments to identify the specific needs

• Manage Petty Cash and prepare expense report and credit daily in computer for Procurement Supervisor
• Make sure to check with stock keeper before ordering.

• At least 1-2 years of work experiences in Procurement and sourcing
• Familiar with Windows Live Mail and MS. Office is highly desired, not mandatoryfor SUN system
• Understanding logistics concepts
• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control
• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;
• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;
• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.
• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem solving skills;
• Ability to Prioritize tasks
• Experience in construction purchase is a must.

job title: អ្នកជំនាញបង្កើតកម្មវិធីបង្រៀនកុមារពិសេស(អូទីស្សឹម)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: អ្នកជំនាញបង្កើតកម្មវិធីបង្រៀនកុមារពិសេស(អូទីស្សឹម)
Job Description:
A. Manage learning and teaching programs
• Develop and organize curriculum according to students’ level and problem.
• Organize teachers and students according to grade level.

Examine and prepare teaching materials for teachers according to their needs and requests.
• Prepare study packages according to students’ needs.
• Collect and review the teacher’s curriculum on a monthly basis.
• Solve all student problems with the class teacher.
• Meet with student’s parent / guardian regarding the student’s development with homeroom teacher.
•Provide good advice for special education staff.

B. Special Education Jobs
• Inspect and evaluate the teaching in the first and second semester and provide feedbacks on teaching.
• Organize monthly technical team meetings.
• Lead teachers to organize index classes according to each grade.
• Lead teachers to prepare and develop the annual study curriculum.
• Spot check on teacher teaching

C. Administrative Management

Interview and evaluate new students enrolled in special education schools and issue reports.
• Supervise the responsibilities of teachers, students and office staff.Manage and make other relevant administrative documents of special education schools.
• Prepare the annual work plan of the special education school.
• Attend American Intercon School Committee and Building Committee meetings.
• Attend meetings with the school committee or other institutions assigned by head principals and principals.

D. General Management

• Manage the work with high efficiency.
• Manage special education curriculum effectively.
• Set goals and missions for the assigned personal tasks.
• Ensure the teaching work of teachers daily with high quality and efficiency.

E. Team work communication

Pay attention, listen and understand the needs of partners of communication.
• Have fun with communication partners.
• Meet the needs of communication partners in a timely manner.
• Pay attention to responding with communication partners.

F. Programming and management

Plan work effectively according to the set school calendar.
• Manage the work according to its role by providing information to head principal and principal
• Organize the exam process according to the ability of each student.
• Organize certification programs for special education students.
Job Requirement:
• Have a bachelor’s or master’s degree in education or equivalent.
• Knowledge of foreign languages, especially English.Ability to manage work, special education skills, administrative work.
• At least 5 years of management experience in education.
• Ability to consult and solve student problems, teacher problems.
• Knowledge of pedagogical psychology.
• Knowledge of information technology applicable to the program: Ms. Words, Ms. Excels, Power Point, Internet, and Email.
• Ability to work as a team.
• Ability to lead a team: plan, implement, monitor and evaluate
• Ability to analyze student situation: study, family and well-being.
• Have a conscience as an educator.
• Be honest and love children.
• Perseverance, coordination, initiative and creativity.Be punctual and respect working hours.
• Be independent and able to work under pressure.

• Respect and abide by the internal rules of the institution.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖

• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ

•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Assist customers with purchases
• Prepare displays of books/school uniforms and assist with relocation of stocks when needed
• Maintaining Intercon bookstore stock inventory control records, providing a list of low stock items for reorder
• Respond to or direct telephone and walk-in inquiries as appropriate, and provide information concerning stock availability and other Intercon Bookstore activities to employees and students
• Check the quality of products when receive the new shipment by comparing with the Master Sample on hand
• Prepare daily sale report to the accountant department
• Prepare monthly sale return report to the accountant department
• Prepare administrative and operational reports such as Staff detail, History, Event history, Staff movement, AI&SL and record the minute meeting
• Perform routine closing procedure, counting cash drawer, shutting down computer system and cash registers
• Open or closes the Intercon Bookstore in accordance with detailed procedures.
• Perform assigned responsibilities, duties, and tasks according to established practices procedures, techniques, and standards in a safe and efficient manner and with minimal supervision.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degrees in Business Administration, Accounting and Finance or a closely related fields• Working knowledge of sales procedures and practices• Ability to handle money responsibly• Ability to follow verbal and written instructions• Ability to follow directions, read or copy information correctly• Excellent customer service and communication skills• A working knowledge of the procedures and practices used in registering and handling cash receipts• Ability to develop and maintain recordkeeping system and stock control procedures• Familiarity with the inventory process• Ability to record transactions• Sound knowledge of Ms office, Outlook• Good time management skill.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Oversee daily operations of six Intercon Bookstores and one central warehouse.- Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures.- Develop and update standard operating procedures (SOP) for Intercon Bookstore.- Ensure staff follows standard operating procedures for all operational functions.- Coordinate activities that affect operational decisions and business requirements.- Work with both Aii Language Center (Aii) and American Intercon School (AIS) to make sure   that all school supplies are available and on time for students.- Develop and execute the business strategy plan in order to promote their products as   well as to expand the existing businesses.- Develop and implements systems and processes (POS System) to establish and maintain   records for the operation unit.- Keep track of staffing requirements, hire and train new talent as needed to correspond   with specific duties and skill sets.- Maintain safe and healthy work environment by establishing, following and enforcing   standards and procedures and complying with legal regulations.- Plan, schedule, and review workload and manpower to make sure targets are being met on a   cost-effective basis.- Work with the senior managements to determine values and mission, and plan for short and   long-term goals.- Communicate customer issues with staff and develop ways of improving the customer   experience, including resolving problems and complaints.- Manage work assignment and allocation for staff.- Prepare budget plan.- Monitor and control expense according to allotted budget.- Review daily and monthly sale and sale return reports. - Ensure accurate and timely stock counts, carried out according to the operation   procedure.- Supervise and coordinate activities of staff concerned with ordering, receiving,   storing, inventorying, issuing, and shipping books, uniforms, and supplies in stockroom   or warehouse.- Plans layout of stockroom, warehouse, and other storage areas, considering turnover,   size, weight, and related factors of items stored.- Reviews records for accuracy of information and compliance with established procedures,   and to determine adequacy of stock levels.- Do round, spot check and conducts surprise stock count.- Schedules work for special and periodic inventories.- Other assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirement: - Proven business development, marketing, sales, or marketing experience.- Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.- Exceptional leadership and management skills.- Effective communication and negotiation skills.- Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.- Detail-oriented and persuasive.HOW TO APPLY Email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: (855) 12 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564

Job Description: - Administration and control of Intercon Bookstore operation including customer service- Direct Intercon Bookstore staffs in the performance of all day-to-day operation by provide all staff with daily task list- Designing strategies to response the company strategy plan- Review daily sale and Sale return report - Review monthly Sale and Sale return report- Ensure accurate and timely stock counts, carried out according to the operation procedure- Monthly stock count- monthly stock count report for all campuses- Prepare and review monthly work action plan for all staff- Check and review on staff tardiness and performance- Solved issued with other departments- Perform assigned responsibilities, duties, and other tasks according to established practices procedures and standards in a safe and efficient manner- Perform other related duties as requested- Ensure daily operational of all IB stores run smoothly both internal and external- Ensure CSR is properly monitor- Control all IB revenue, Discount, Sale return- Improve customer services- Create and update procedure for operations- Coordinate with staffs and other departments- Monitor and control stock managements of all IB store- Staff managements- Create good environment for teamwork- Randomly spot check and do round- Cash float control of all stores- Review on pricing- Create operation flow and training before implement (new product, services, promotion etc)- Make sure information has been proper sharing to all relevant staffs- Make clear instruction, Tasks, deadline to staffs- Direct Intercon Bookstore staff in the performance of all day-to-day operation by provide all staff with daily task list- Check and review daily sale and sale return report- Check and review monthly sale and sale return report- Conduct monthly stock count- Prepare administrative and operational reports as requires- Solve issue with other departments- Perform other related duties required by line manager.

job title: Operations Manager of Alex Quach Auto Shop (ប្រធានប្រត្តិបត្តិគ្រប់គ្រងហ្គារ៉ាសឡាន)

position: Operations Manager of Alex Quach Auto Shop (ប្រធានប្រត្តិបត្តិគ្រប់គ្រងហ្គារ៉ាសឡាន)
Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations, remedy customer complains promptly, and ensure customer satisfaction metric and met.
• Recruit, hire, and train subordinate staff to ensure each department is qualify to meet profit levels.
• Assist with the creation of affordable advertising campaigns and program to increase sale and brand visibility for the car dealership.
• Attend head of each department meeting and establish good working relationship both internal and car owner.
• To understanding our Vision and Mission and car owner needs and develop plans to address them.
• Ensure the auto shop service team attends to all customer complaints and requirement which to be notice.
• Resolve all people and safety issues in timely and effective manner, collaborating with relevant department and appropriate teams effectively.
• Confer with customers to obtain descriptions of vehicle problems and discuss work to be performed.
• Estimated costs and time required for repair or maintenance of the vehicle.
• Plan, organize and coordinate the day-to-day running of garage, e.g., by writing work orders and by arranging for garage staff to perform necessary maintenance and repair work on vehicle.
• Repair, maintain and service vehicles and their mechanical and electronic components.
• Ensure that necessary spare parts, materials and equipment are available or obtainable at short notice.
• Check the activities in the garage, inspect completed work for compliance with safety and other statutory regulations, and make sure defects are repaired or adjusted.
• Maintain records of repair and service work, and make reports to detect recurrent faults.
• Make sure the vehicle is returned to the owner in a clean and decent state.
• Provide information for staff about latest development, technical specification of new cars, garage merchandise, etc.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree is preferred but not required, a high school diploma• Knowledge of garage auto shop industry and trends.• Minimum of 3 years of experience with emphasis on automotive operation (Service Manager, or Master Technician).• Possess a state- issued driver’s license and acceptable driving record to operate dealership-owned vehicle.• Excellent communication skills.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារសូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: We are looking for a compassionate, experienced psychiatrist to join our medical                 facility. Researching new developments in psychiatry and mental health.
Job Requirement: .4 years of psychiatric residency.. Excellent verbal and written communication.. Superior listening ability and emotional intelligence.. Expert diagnostic skills.

job title: Executive Secretary to the Vice President for Academic Affairs
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Executive Secretary to the Vice President for Academic Affairs
Job Description: - Manage and prioritize VPA’s calendar appointments- Communication follow up- Manage logistics for meetings and events- Provide reception for office and receive visitors- Order office supplies- Manage files for Academic Affairs- Interact with other departments to facilitate the work of Academic Affairs- Manage the policy development process in Academic Affairs- Monitor and support the approval process for partnership agreements- Support coverage for other administrative assistants during absence and vacation- Provide administrative support to committees which fall within the authority of the VPA- Serve as a resource to committee Chairs and members, provide background documentation and advice on processes and protocols- Maintain current terms of reference for the different committees- Prepare payments for guests, speakers, and external reviewers- Prepare expense submissions for VPA- Support budget planning activities for Academic Affairs- Support the process for awarding Professional Development funds - Human Resource Support in Academic Affairs- Support VPA in signing contracts prepared by Human Resources- Administrative support for the VPA- In collaboration with the Directors and VPA, research, compile, edit and submit annual reports and academic plans- Support compilation of school review reports for accrediting bodies- Organize site visits for accrediting bodies- Provide administrative support for surveys in collaboration with the other offices and departments- Organize and update the electronic files - Support compilation of faculty annual reports- Administrative Support for the Research Office
Job Requirement: - Excellent time management and organization skills, especially the ability to prioritize and multitask- Effective and professional communication abilities, including being able to communicate with all levels of employees, vendors and clients or guests- Good written and verbal communication skills- Professional writing capabilities, including emails, memos, letters and other industry-related reports, documents, and correspondence- Project management skills, like goal setting, budget management and planning- Great customer service and interpersonal skills- Good computer skills, including basic troubleshooting skills - Familiarity with word processing software for creating and contributing to spreadsheets, drafting, and sharing documents and creating engaging and informative presentations- In-depth understanding of the industry or office s/he works in- Systematic thinker with detailed research proficiencies- Thorough understanding of clerical and secretarial principles, policies, and guidelines- Strong knowledge of databases and tracking systems- Fantastic organizational skills and detail oriented- Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Reviewing IT audit planning, define key risk concerns, and conduct IT internal audit mission with IT IAO
• Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit as well as full support to the IT IAO
• Supervision and monitoring of IT audit works performed by the team members and consolidate IT internal audit report
• Maximizing effectiveness of the IT audit results through participation in the management meeting – debriefing
• Actively involved in controlling the IT department under own responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost control management, business and controls risks – any particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be brought to the attention of the IAD/IT IAM, then meeting with MJQ’s senior management for solutions
• Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge exchange and internal audit quality in its process and output
• Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual IT audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the IT audit field works, meeting notes etc.
• Ensure that all IT working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.
• Assist to design IT IA policy, procedure and guideline for IT IA team to implement effectively
• Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes
• Ensure suggestions for more efficient and effective identification/IT audit procedures of material gaps under area of responsibilities
• Identify the weaknesses and risks in IT infra-structure, servers and database.
• Provide security best practice to IT Infra-structure, servers and database to prevent security breaches.
• Initiate internal controls document to ensure key risk in IT department are identifying and testing.
• Other tasks assigned by the IAD/IT IAM
Job Requirement:
• A minimum university degree in IT. IIA understanding or Master of IT degree is an advantage.
• About 1 years of experience in the leadership role or 3 years of experience of IT audit
• At least 3 years of IT audit experience (Information system governance, Infra-structure security, severs security hardening, database security hardening)
• Certified Ethical Hacker is preferred.
• Knowledge of Information Technologies Standard Framework.
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system in Firewall
• Knowledge of database and software for query report such as SQL, VBA,… is an advantage
• Knowledge of IT and system project is preferable
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• Good written and spoken English, as well as communication and interpersonal skills
• High motivation and ability to work without supervision.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: General Manager for Retail, Food & Beverage
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: General Manager for Retail, Food & Beverage
Job Description: - I Explore new business opportunities and execute systematic prospecting in business development- Develop, coach and manage a professional team tasked with identifying new opportunities;- Initiate creative concepts and assist the Owner in making executive decisions on business development by reporting to the Owner and providing advice on a regular basis;- Connect and interact with existing and potential business partners on property development projects;- Develop accurate and aggressive long and short-range financial objectives and budget consistent with the Company's objective and mission;- Manage and executes marketing, sales, and operational strategies and activities, producing results that meet or exceed the company’s business plan;- Maintain product and service quality standards by conducting ongoing evaluations and investigating complaints and initiate corrective actions;- Prepare financial reports for management that clearly explain operational effectiveness, trends and variances;- Liaise with superior to make decisions for operational activities and set strategic goals for Property Management;- Evaluate regularly the efficiency of business procedures according to organizational objectives and apply improvements;- Provide the team, functional units, and management with a clear picture of current business performance and progress towards targets via preparation of relevant reports and dashboards;- Support the execution of the Company’s Business Plans and ensure initiatives, budget and KPIs are consistently met;- Support key cross-functional activities for the team, such as cross-border activities by working with team and cross department to ensure goal alignment and execution on all initiatives to achieve Company’s goals;- Monitor product budgets reporting associated with product platforms, ensuring budget is fully optimized while proper processes are followed and initiatives are delivered on time and within agreed budget;- Acquire new partnership relationships with strong and reputational corporates companies in the market;- Drive strategic sales initiatives including creating schemes for partners, sales team to deliver outstanding sales results performance and drive the right sales behaviors;- Accountable for achieving defined target objectives in respect of sales and business growth in alignment with the business direction;- Monitor and communicate sales results regularly to both internal and internal stakeholder to ensure alignment and decision making;- Oversee customer support processes and organize them to enhance customer satisfaction;- Review financial information and adjust operational budgets to promote profitability;- Revise and/or formulate operational policies, procedure, flows, etc. and promote their implementation;- Manage relationships/agreements with external partners/vendors;- Evaluate overall performance by gathering, analyzing and interpreting data and metrics;- Develop and implement programs to ensure risk prevention and fraud awareness is optimized and reduced;- Manage and engage regularly with partners to build strong relationship;- Constantly look out to develop new avenues of business with the partner to maximize the partnership potential;- Influence the decision with partners toward achieving strategic common and profitable goals;- Work closely with both internal and external stakeholders to enhance processes, efficiency and customers experiences;- Manage, leads, develops and coaches team to achieve team performance effectiveness, personal career development and future succession planning;- Enforce sales performance standards to promote business quality.
Job Requirement: - Master's degree in business administration, business development or equivalent qualification is a must;- At least 8 years of working experience in property development company, and at least 5 years of working experience in hospitality industry.- At least 3 years working experience in similar position or senior position- Strong knowledge in Cambodian market- Very good at business analyzing and critical thinking- In-depth knowledge of cash flow management, revenue and cost drivers, operational risk management and the cultivation of client relationships in real estate development projects- Familiarity with property development market and business environment in the industry and adaptability to changes from time to time- Leadership in driving sales and new business opportunities- Solid project management skills- Strong interpersonal skills to manage and inspire team members to outperform- Strong at time management and presentation skills- Strong hospitality spirit

Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations.
• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.
• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.

• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).
• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.
• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
