company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Follow and maintains knowledge of all school policies and procedures.
• Perform general office duties including answering multi-line phones, routing telephone calls or messages to appropriate staff, greeting the public, typing, proofreading, filing, sorting and handling incoming and outgoing mail, as needed.
• Research, create, input, format, organize and edit relevant data as needed or requested and prepare in a usable format for the school.
• Completes a high volume of computer work, using school computer and programs, to input a high volume of data with speed and accuracy, including confidential data, in an environment with constant interruptions.
• Processes and tracks employee timesheets and work with the personnel officer and the HRD for approval.
• Assists in preparing school materials (i.e., brochures, newsletters, learning materials etc.).
• Reconciles account balances and financial documentation (Request form, cash receipts, and approval) ensuring accuracy.
• Independently or in accordance with general instruction, composes correspondence on a wide range of subjects, requiring knowledge of procedures and policies of the assigned area.
• Serves as receptionist and gives information or directs visitors and parents to appropriate offices, as needed.
• Answers inquiries concerning standardized policies, procedures, and regulations.
• Coordinates scheduling of meetings, appointments and travel and assists with all other administrative needs.
• Schedules conferences, programs, events and teachers individual schedule as required including creating schedules, contacting all invited parties, preparing confirmation and distributing materials to teachers.
• Places orders for all classroom and office supplies, as needed or requested.
• Professionally represents the school and the District in interactions with parents, community, staff and students.
• Maintains appropriate certifications and training hours as required.
• Attends work regularly and is punctual.
• Supervise academic secretary
• Check and process the sick and annual leave
• Process and confirm teacher and staff probation with HR
• Monitor and report the monthly teacher tardiness
• Arrange and monitor with the personnel officer the teacher written test
• Help and arrange the teacher interview with the personnel officer.
• Work and check with the personnel officer the in and out process of the teachers
• Work with Personnel officer and Submit the monthly staff movement:
• Promotion
• Change position
• Change campus
• Change working hours
• Suspension, fire, lay off, ditch
• Write and keep Aii Academic Secretary history record (All Campuses)
• Update Academic and secretary staff details
• Ensure and evaluate all teaching materials and equipment are in good condition.
• Ensure and maintain the order of the academic office
• Maintain records and files especially teachers and other staff CVs
• Write and submit history of the academic events every month
• Process new teacher and academic staff the username, email and MJQ server etc.
• Other assigned tasks
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree in Education/Administration or related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ប្រធានប្រតិបត្តិការសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ជូន អន្តរទ្វីប
Job Description: - គ្រប់គ្រងសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ជូន អន្តរទ្វីបទាំងមូលមាន សេវាកម្មរថយន្តសាលា យានដ្ឋានអាឡិចគួច និងផលគួចលាងរថយន្ត។- គ្រប់គ្រងតាមដានប្រព័ន្ធ DATA BUS និង GPS ឡាន និងម៉ូតូរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។- ធ្វើផែនការថវិការប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ផ្នែក។- គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យរថយន្តទាំងអស់។- គ្រប់គ្រងតំបន់ឡានរត់ និងសិក្សាពង្រីកតំបន់ថ្មី និងបិទតំបន់មួយចំនួន។- ទទួលទិញឡានថ្មី ចូល និងសិក្សាលក់ឡានចាស់ៗចេញវិញ។- គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្ន័យការចាក់ប្រេងប្រើកាតជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន TOTAL ទាំងប្រាំបីសាខាទាំងក្នុងរាជធានី និងបណ្តាខេត្ត និងសាខាដែលនិងរៀបចំបើកដំណើរនៅក្នុងថ្ងៃអនាគត់។ - គ្រប់គ្រងរបាយការណ៍សិស្ស ប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ម រថយន្តសាលាប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និង ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។- ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ និង ចុះហត្ថលេខាចំណាយ និងចំណូល ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និង ប្រចាំខែ ក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងមូល។- ចុះហត្ថលេខា តំណាងស្ថាប័ន លើលិខិត សុំច្បាប់ និងកិច្ចសន្យាការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។- ពិនិត្យ CV បេក្ខជនដាក់ពាក្យ និងចូលរួមសម្ភាសន៍ជាមួយផ្នែកHR។- ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពតំណាងផ្នែក និងតំណាងស្ថាប័ន ដូចជាការ ប្រជុំ វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ។ល។- ចងក្រងបទបញ្ញត្តិ និងតាមដានការអនុវត្តន៍ច្បាប់ដែលបានដាក់ចេញឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។- សិក្សាអំពីទីផ្សារខាងក្រៅ ដើម្បីកែប្រែនូវផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តក្នុងផ្នែក។- បើកអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដើម្បីចែកចាយព័ត៌មាន និង ពង្រឹងច្បាប់ទម្លាប់។- ចូលរួមដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។- បើកវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងបំពាក់បំប៉នសមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក។- ប្រឈមមុខក្នុងការដោះស្រាយ វិវាទបុគ្គលិក និងជាតំណាងស្ថាប័ន។- ណែនាំបុគ្គលិកដែលមានកំហុសចុងក្រោយ។- ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារជាក់ស្តែងតាមសាខាទាំងរាជធានី និងបណ្តាខេត្ត។
Job Requirement: - បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬស្មើ - មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកវិស័យដឹកជញ្ជូន និងដឹកនាំយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ ៣ឆ្នាំ។- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ និងការបើកបរ។- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានស្ទាត់ជំនាញ- មានចំណេះដឹកក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email). - មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់។- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.- Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.- Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.- Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.- Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent- Master degree is a plus- Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to employ technology- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.

MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005.

Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • ទទួលផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែកអំពីការងារដែលត្រូវជួលជុល• ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពីគុណភាពគ្រឿង• របាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកវិញនូវចំនុចដែលខូចខាត ដើម្បីពិភាក្សាជួសជុល ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរ• ដាក់លិខិតស្នើសុំទៅកាន់ផ្នែកឃ្លាំងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែកដើម្បីស្នើសុំសម្ភារៈ• ការជួសជុលត្រូវផ្តោតទៅលើពេលវេលា គុណភាព សោភ័ណភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពខ្ពស់• សរុបរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកនូវសកម្មភាពពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• សម្អាតបរិវេណ និងរថយន្ត ឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• ត្រូវជួយការងារដល់ជាងដទៃទៀតនៅពេលដែលមិនទាន់ទទួលបានផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែក• ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើទោះបីជាដល់ម៉ោងចេញក៏ដោយ• អាចមកធ្វើការថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រសិនជាមានការស្នើសុំពីប្រធានផ្នែក• បាញ់ថ្នាំឡានគ្រប់ប្រភេទ• បាញ់ថ្នាំលើទ្វាររ៉ូត• លាយថ្នាំបាញ់ឱ្យស៊ីពណ៌សាច់ឡាន• បៀកកាវឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ខាតកាវបៀកឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ឆាបដែកឱ្យស្មើរគ្នា• សម្អាតតួរថយន្តឱ្យស្អាតមុន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ឬបាញ់ស្លាកសញ្ញា• បិទក្រដាសកាសែតកន្លែងដែលមិនត្រូវបាញ់ថ្នាំ កុំឱ្យសាចថ្នាំប្រឡាក់• សហការជាមួយលេខាធិការយានដ្ឋាន អំពីតម្រូវការ ការស្ទីកគ័របាញ់ថ្នាំ• បាញ់ថ្នាំយ៉ាន់ និងតាបួររថយន្ត• តោនឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក និងភ្លី• ប្តូរមេឡានពុក• តោន បាត សាច់ជញ្ជាំង ដំបូល និង ទ្វាររថយន្ត• រៀបចំលួសទុកសម្រាប់ផ្សា• កាត់ដំបូលក្បាលឡាន ទុកសម្រាប់ប៉ះកន្លែងខូចខាតរបស់រថយន្ត• រៀបចំផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ថ្មស្អុយ និងអុកស៊ីសែន• រៀបចំកៅស៊ូមេ ប្រឡុង ខ្ចៅ វីស• លាបឡាំងកូតបាតរថយន្ត• បិទស្ទីកគ័រលើឡាន កញ្ចក់ ដែក ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ការ៉ូ• រៀបចំដែកកេះ ស្កុតក្រដាស កំបិតតូច ធំ• រៀបចំបិទស្ទីកគ័រកាត់រូបភាព អក្សរ និងក្រដាសគំរូត្រូវបិទ• រៀបចំក្រណាត់ទុកជូត
Job Requirement: • ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី12• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ• បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 1 ឆ្នាំ• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQE ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

Job Description: •	Align Company Objective and brand direction•	Work closely with brand marketing to Implement company communication strategy through digital platform•	Plan and manage our social media platforms •	Translate communication strategy into action plan.•	Create online and offline marketing content with mostly digital tools•	Initiative consumer engagement programs through social platform•	Managing online brand and product campaigns to raise brand awareness•	Keep up to that with new technologies and keep the company at the forefront of developments in digital marketing•	Work closely with brand •	Work closely with team to align marketing campaigns with brand strategy across various digital channel activations.•	Manage website contents and closely monitoring to keep website up to date align with marketing campaign and activation•	Prepare accurate reports on our digital marketing campaign’s overall performance•	Work with the team to brainstorm new and innovative growth strategies to increase band awareness and engagement•	Responsibility for planning and budgetary control of all digital marketing activities•	Evaluating online customer research, market conditions and competitor’s data•	Overseeing the social media strategy for the company•	Monthly budget report and digital operation report tracking•	Any task assigned by line manager

Company Profile: Hanuman Beverages is the Cambodian beverage master who commits to creating best-in-class beverages that innovate new tastes for the Cambodian people. With an investment of over 160 million US dollars, creating direct and indirect employments for over 1,000 people whilst supporting thousands more external stakeholders, Hanuman Beverages is committed to contributing to the economic growth of Cambodia. With our passion, we will be sure to make a positive mark on the beverage industry in Cambodia.

Job Description: • To ensure effective utilization of warehouse loading, unloading, stocking, and safekeeping of items to maintain the quality of finished goods in order to prevent product damage and avoid the occurrence of pilferage, accidents, and occupational hazards.• Effectively monitor flow of goods and implements first- In First- Out (FIFO) methods in the use of raw materials and dispatching of finished goods.• To coordinates with the procurement department with regards to incoming deliveries of raw materials and supplies.• To coordinates with production, packaging, and distribution with regards to transfer and dispatch of finished goods.• To effectively prepare and monitor the forklift team supporting to the production side.• To effectively prepare and monitor the Warehouse team to issue finished goods to transport agents, make sure 100% OTIF and Zero complaints.• Be initiative of hazardous point protection proposal to management inside the warehouse and distribution operation.• To ensure accuracy of product inventories against system records by conducting cycle counts on a periodic basis following appropriate guidelines by accounting and audit departments• To conducts regular cycle count as per established schedules and guidelines. Evaluates and analyze inventory variance. Implements preventive countermeasures based on the result of inventory variance analysis. • To resolve inventory discrepancies in coordination with the accounting department. • To ensure the integrity and completeness of logistics records and manuals• To provide clear directions and general guidance to the department in the formulation of standard operating procedures. • To plan and optimize warehouse and distribution products to meet Key Performance Indicators and cost-efficiency.• To initiate, execute or participate in suitable action where necessary to improve logistics operations.• To develop and train warehouse personnel from time to time on safety, warehouse, and distribution competencies to enhance the knowledge.• Be possible to operate a forklift to support operations base on the real situation.• To do other related tasks required by superior Management.• To work effectively and efficiently to comply with the quality management system ISO 9001 and food safety management system ISO 22000 requirement.
Job Requirement: • Education: Preferably Bachelor level of Business Management, Logistics/ Supply Chain.• Experiences: Minimum 2 years of experience (preferable in the manufacturing industry) and managing of people related to warehouse and distribution management.• Skills: Leadership, effective communication, result-oriented, 5S and Health & Safety, SAP.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations.
• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.
• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.
• Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.
• Recording patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.
• Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.
• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).
• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.
• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
Job Requirement:
• Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in nursing required.
• 1-3 years nursing experiences.
• Basic computer skills.
• Experiences in home health care.
• Experiences in emergency room or intensive care.
• Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physician and staff.


**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Provide inspiring and purposeful leadership for the staff, teachers and students.- Work in partnership with the Aii, staff and parents generating the beliefs and values that will underpin the school.- Continue to implement a Development Plan that will secure continuous school improvement.- Monitor and evaluate the performance of the school and respond and report to the management as required.- Ensure that management, finances, organization and administration of the school supports its vision and aims.- Ensure that school policies and practices take account of national, local and school requirements.- Monitor, evaluate and review the impact of policies, priorities and targets of the school in practice, and take action if necessary.- Ensure that all those involved in the school are committed to its aims, motivated to achieve them, and involved in meeting long, medium and short term objectives and targets which secure the educational success of the school.- Secure delivery of the highest possible standards of teaching and learning throughout the school.- Develop and maintain a focus on achievement, maximizing the potential and academic performance of all students against national and individual targets and aspirations.- Maintain effective assessment, recording and reporting systems of student progress and ensure these are used to challenge underperformance and drive improvement.- Build and maintain effective partnerships between school, students and parents to support learning.- Involve students, as appropriate, in the decision-making processes in the school by developing policies and practice that treat students as partners in the learning process.- Monitor, evaluate and review classroom practice and promote improvement strategies leading to raised standards.- Develop and implement a broad and relevant curriculum, which embraces the school’s specialisms, innovative approaches to teaching and learning, national initiatives and is at the forefront of best practice, to meet the needs of all students.- Ensure that educational provision and achievement for pupils with special needs are maximized through an appropriate mix of integrated and specialist needs provision.- Monitor and evaluate the curriculum for both quality and value for money.- Ensure that suitably challenging targets are set, including those for student attainment, progress, behavior and attendance.- Develop an ethos and structure for managing behavior, which enables each student to achieve their potential, including the management of pastoral care, student welfare and effective anti-bullying procedures.- Be outward facing, taking a strategic role in the development of new and emerging technologies to enhance and extend the learning experience of students and the pedagogical skills of staff, deploying technological resources effectively and efficiently in order to realize the aims of the school.- Create a culture of challenge, high expectations and support where all students can achieve success and be engaged in personalized learning, supported by a curriculum offer appropriate to their individual needs, aspirations and abilities.- Ensure a wide range of community-based, off-site and outdoor learning experiences are available.- To promote extracurricular activities in accordance with the educational aims of the school.- Supervise ESL Teachers and other staff.- Plan, allocate, support and evaluate work undertaken by groups, teams and individuals, ensuring clear delegation of tasks and devolution of responsibilities in a manner consistent with conditions of employment.- Implement and sustain effective systems for the management of staff performance, incorporating performance management and target setting.- Promote and monitor the continuing professional development of staff, conduct a workshop or sharing sessions to the teachers under supervision.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.

Job Description: - Oversee the school campus.- Plan for and execute the continuous growth of the campus.   - Read and respond to teaching and non-teaching staff term report.- Monitor student, teaching and non-teaching staff opinion survey and result.- Prepare teaching schedule.- Monitor personnel management (staff details, staff requisition, CV shortlist, contract, timesheet check, leave check, monthly staff movement, salary addition and deduction, absence record, etc.)- Establish and maintain professional and cooperative working relationships with all stakeholders: parents, students, staff, neighbors, and partners.- Supervise school and public safety and school maintenance.- Supervises the maintenance of student records, including assessment results, test scores, discipline citations, and other documents.- Prepare and process field trip requests.- Maintain and update school website regularly.- Prepare and maintains purchase orders and other expense records; approve, and monitor expenditures and ensure expenditures are within budget allowances for the year.- Prepare necessary forms to hire, upgrade, terminate or authorize special payments to staff.- Recruit qualified and experienced teachers and staff. - Plans, assigns, trains, and evaluate classified staff in accordance with school standards, timelines, and procedures.- Plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.- Act as liaison between school and other schools, the parents, outside agencies, and the public.- Develop, implement, and monitor work practices, systems, and methods that are effective, efficient, and consistent with school standards, policies, and procedures.- Prepare annual school calendar and plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.- Promote and maintain a positive and effective school climate by ensuring that all interactions with staff, students, parents, and the public at large are prompt, efficient, helpful and friendly.- Seek out and participate in educational and professional development. - Recognize problems and impediment and report them promptly with solutions to the President- Monitor and analyze student performance assessment data preparing reports as needed for various special projects.- Perform other duties as assigned by Chairman and President- Read all comments from the student opinion survey about their teachers and the school as a whole. Take actions on those comments where and when applicable. - Read all comments or complaints sent by the Information Office. Solve them where and when applicable. - Update all handbooks regularly, usually termly, based on the changes of the policies. - Go and check each cafeteria twice per week in each building and write a report and then submit to the Office of the President every week. - Do the CBC round as schedule. -​ Get the P&L, CF, BS of each business and service units every month from Finance Department. Call for a meeting with those business and service units every month.

Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.- Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.- Be well planned for her/ his class. Job Description: - Be responsible and accountable for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with Faculty and the Aii Language Center strategic plans and direction.- Be an active member of the Faculty Executive Board and contribute to the overall leadership and management of the Faculty: it is expected that Deputy Campus Director will carry functional responsibility for specific agreed cross-cutting Faculty areas.- Develop and sustain appropriate structures for management, consultation, decision-making and communication with staff and students.- Promote and represent the center both internally and externallyResponsibility for Teaching & Students- Ensure the best possible student experience - Refresh and develop new programs in order to attract new students and markets.Responsibility for Research- Ensure the highest levels of quality, integrity and ethics in all research undertaken.- Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students.- Create and exploit new opportunities for knowledge transfer activity in order to secure additional income streams and new areas of teaching and/or research.- Contribute to the center-wide initiatives in order to improve understanding and communication of this area.- Ensure that School HR policies and procedures are implemented.- Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the Management & the Senate, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place- Ensure all staffs have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.- Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.- Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the Faculty.- Ensure students are included as appropriate in the various decisions making within the department.- Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.- Supervise & work collaboratively with the head teachers.- Take responsibility for devolved budgets and comply with the centers financial regulations.- Manage income and expenditure in order to promote financial sustainability.- Ensure adherence by all Departmental members, with the Center Financial Regulations and other financial operating procedures and regulations.- Ensure that Center’s equipment/facilities under the department´s control are properly maintained and serviced as required.- Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.- Comply with auditing, quality assurance and management procedures both internal and external development of Academic & Research- Develop and implement all short term and long term strategies and ensure consistency in same.- Assist management with accurate information as required for all campus associate activities and initiate decisions.- Determine and ensure effective maintenance on organized structure on campus.- Supervise effective working of all subordinates and provide business and managerial assistance to all and develop effective team.- Analyze all fiscal requirements for campus and execute strategies to achieve same.- Ensure adherence to all statutory and regulatory regulations.- Develop and implement various business plans on quarterly and monthly basis ensure effective working of everyday operations- Monitor all objectives and strategic goals for operations and finances and ensure achievement of same.Develop various new academic programs and provide modification to all current programs.- Administer all student recruitment.
Job Requirement: - Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.

Job Description:
Governance and Leadership
•	Work with the BoD (Board of Directors) in setting-up the company’s strategic direction and articulate the company’s future milestone.
•	Oversee annual business plan (narrative and financial) preparation, in line with the strategic direction, for validation by the BoD.
•	Ensure alignment of the business plan to both financial and social targets. 
•	Ensure the accuracy and completeness of information reported, presenting these via quarterly and annual reports to BoD, and through an open communication channel to raise concerns as they present themselves.
•	Ensure the company’s systems are best-in-class and respond to the front and back-office needs of the company.
•	Ensure that the organization, structure, and human resources are aligned to the needs of the business.
Market Development
•	In line with the company’s set strategy, lead on market studies to explore new products and opportunities.
•	Work with actuaries and re-insurers to validate products.
•	Approve term sheets to pilot and then put products to markets.
•	Explore new partnerships and distribution channels. 
Sales Management
•	Oversee sales performance from promotional campaigns to marketing material development.
•	Drive sales targets and ensure alignment to these, driving the company towards sustainability and profitability, as set in the approved business plans.
•	Ensure quality of services provided for client retention and to safeguard the reputation of the company in the market.
Risk and Compliance
•	Ensure a strong set up of internal control and other support systems for the company.
•	Ensure compliance to all regulatory frameworks as they evolve.
•	Liaise and build effective relationships with the regulator and other public stakeholders.
•	Improve the internal controls system to ensure they are comprehensive and effective as regards operational policies, procedures, guidelines and forms and other reporting and monitoring tools.
•	Ensure adequate monitoring of the levels of risk related to micro-insurance and ensure effectiveness and efficiency of operational risk management.
Financial Oversight
•	Ensure accurate recording of financial transactions, and the implementation of effective checks and balances for error / fraud risk mitigation.
Job Requirement:
•	BA/MBA in Accounting, Banking/Finance, Business Management or other related fields 
•	At least two years’ experience holding management position in insurance industry.
•	Have experience in executive role and dealing with regulators
•	Have experience with global / international companies
•	Have experience in sales and business development
•	General knowledge of primary business processes and functions (finance, HR, procurement, operations, sale etc.) 
•	Commitment to inclusive insurance and social business concepts
•	Excellent communication skills
•	Outstanding organizational and leadership skills
•	Have experience in Micro-insurance (preferred)
•	Experience as senior / C-level staff (preferred)
Company Profile: Renet Japan Cambodia under parent company, ReNet Japan Group, aims to develop microfinance business in Cambodia as a social financial institution. We aim to solve the poverty problem with the power finance, at the same time, Prévoir (Kampuchea) Micro Life Insurance Plc,. is also one of the members which is privately owned Cambodian company owned by RENET Japan group. Prévoir is specialized in Health and Accidental insurance targeting low and middle-income households, and aims to be the leading microinsurance company in Cambodia, through an active diversification of products made available to Cambodian households.Currently, Prévoir is looking for competent and ambitious talent for a Chief Executive Office. The CEO will be in charge of setting up the company’s strategic direction, managing day-to-day operations of the company, and ensuring that all departments will act with the highest efficiency and quality. Prévoir works on an ethos of social business, aligning both financial and social targets to its operations and internal management.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  85888420 recruitment@renet.com.kh Phnom Penh #425, St 271, Sangkat Boeung Tompun 1, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 85888420

Job Description: 	Lead in creation of functional specifications in collaboration with product management and engineering teams.	Communicate effectively to and manage product development and delivery within scrum team.	Prioritize and refine backlog and work with engineering to design and build the product	Create IT requirements to drive changes and enhancements in user story format	Establish and monitor performance metrics, providing related reporting to product management and executives to communicate project status.	Act as subject matter expert for assigned area, which could include interfaces to authorization, settlement, internal servicing systems and merchant facing applications.	Conduct research and respond to questions in regards to system functionality. This function will support new development initiatives as well as bug fixes and system patches.	Solidify requirements by analyzing documentation, hosting interviews and conducting research.	Work with engineering to work within, refine and improve agile process	Support, create, open and sponsor projects related to improvements/enhancements in area of ownership (both technical and business related). This includes creation of business requirements and user stories.	Aid in and conduct user acceptance testing.	Resolve production issues escalated by product support teams.
Job Requirement: 	Bachelor’s degree in information services, information technology, computer science, business or related area.	Minimum of 2 years of recent experience as a business analyst / product owner working in the card brand/payment processing industry required.	Experience working in both Waterfall and Agile development environments required.	Ability to contribute effectively within a fast paced, fluid environment.	Strong written and verbal communication skills to interact with a wide audience: IT, development, product management, operations, account support, vendors/partners, customers and management.	Demonstrated ability to successfully manage multiple projects with limited management oversight, including timelines, tasks, teams, group dynamics, etc.	Willingness to do what it takes to ensure the team accomplishes its goals.	Critical thinker with strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Job Description:
* Job Purpose:
Chief Executive Officer is appointed by Board of Directors is to provide overall management to the company to attain its vision, mission, goals, objectives through developing strategic plans, leading, controlling, and monitoring all key activities related to products and services of the company.

* Duties and Responsibilities:
1.	Develop long term strategy/ business plan.
2.	Develop annual plan of action and budget plan against strategic plan annually.
3.	Maintain good relationship with company business partners and government agencies.
4.	Perform competitive analysis on our business. Customer alternatives through personal observations and historical reports.
5.	Execute the decision made by Board of Directors.
6.	Develop, maintain, and disseminate a basic management philosophy to guide all departments, staff toward optimal operating result, staff morale and partner’s satisfaction.
7.	Be a legal representative of company to national and international agencies.
8.	Prepare program and portfolio report for funding agencies and national government agencies if required.
9.	Plan, implement, monitor, and evaluate institutional and operational activities of the institution.
10.	Oversee the overall performance of respective department throughout the company and make sure actions taken of each department are aligned with company business plan.
11.	Monitor the necessary changes in concerned regulatory and legislation and maintain good relationship with them.
Job Requirement:
* Required Qualifications:
1.	Full commitment to company’s vision, mission, purpose, values, procedures, and objectives.
2.	Deep knowledge of corporate regulatory and company rules or norms.
3.	Knowledge in agriculture sector.
4.	Master degree is required (Finance & Banking, Management, or Business Administration).
5.	At least 5 year- experience in the management level. 
6.	Knowledge in management, leading, controlling, analyzing, making decision and decision making.
7.	Proficiency in English communication.
8.	Strategic thinker, good communication, high responsibility, initiative, self-confidence, and proactive person.

* Decision Making and Subordinate(s)
1.	Approve recruitment’s request, staff promotion, demotion and dismissal.
2.	Approve staff’s compensation and benefit.
3.	Approve the investment and expenditure within the company
4.	Be a representative of the company to sign contracts and other agreements with stakeholders.
5.	Approve the capital repayment and withdrawal.
6.	Approve request to work overtime and staff mission on weekend/public holiday and the claim.
7.	Approve Administration Letter and procurement request based on the scope stated in the policies which is approved by the Board of Directors.

Company Profile:
Start your career at Arup, listed in Engineering News Record as one of the top “Best Green Design Firms”, “Top Global Design Firms”, and featured on Fortune Magazine's "Change The World" list of companies that are making the world a better place.

Arup is an independent engineering and consulting firm of 14,000 people in 42 countries around the world. Founded in 1946, we are the creative force at the heart of many of the world’s most prominent projects in the built environment, including the Sydney Opera House, the London Eye, and the Beijing National Stadium (aka the Bird's Nest).

During your career at Arup, you’ll have the chance to engage in a fulfilling career and work with some of the most highly respected engineers and specialists in the world. You’ll also get the opportunity to work on exciting and significant projects, delivering quality work that has a positive and lasting influence on the community and the environment.

Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

job title: Assistant Manager, Process Improvement and Audit

Job Description:
• Work with PIA Manager and management to provide pragmatic process recommendations to drive operational efficiencies/solutions to business problems or requirements

• Execute the set process for follow up on the open audit findings. Support to implement agreed actions as well as, leadership reporting to drive results

Job Description: 1.Labor Law Compliance •Ensure that the company is in the compliance with labor law. •Work closely with the talent acquisition manager to ensure that every new hire does the medical checkup and have employment workbook and work permit (for expats). •Regularly check with related governmental bodies if any new regulations, and then send the update to the management. 2.Talent Acquisition & Induction Program •Coordinate closely with the talent acquisition manager on the recruitment to ensure that talents requested by the business functions on time as planned. •Work with the business functions and the talent acquisition manager to identify issues and process & capability gaps to improve alignment, manpower productivity and minimize redundancies.•Ensure all the employees undergo the induction program. 3.Performance Management •Drive the performance management process with the business functions as per any future performance guideline.•Work with all the managers in the business functions to identify and address performance-related issues. •Provide coaching and supports to all the managers on the performance improvement plans and disciplinary issues. •Devise and implement the performance improvement plans for identified employees. 4.Talent Management and L&D •Work with the L&D team to devise training modules to drive culture change.•Conduct a need analysis and identify the capability gaps in the current employees. •Work with the L&D to devise training program based on the need analysis and gap identified. 5.Employee Relation •Facilitate employee grievance handling.•Investigate (interview, gather evidence, consult legal) allegations of employee misconduct including harassment, discrimination…etc. and guide management on disciplinary and termination procedure.

Outlook…etc.)
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
• Ensure core banking system is available and can response to JMC business requirements.
• Closely coordinate with software vendor to resolve system problems caused by users, hardware and software.
• Create new branches, products, features, modules… up on request.
• Enter, Modify, and delete data, where permitted.
• Consider both "back end" organization of data and "front end" accessibility for end users.
• Control access permissions and privileges to core banking system.
• Support system upgrades, new features and/or product test, and apply fixes/patches.
• Provide system training and support to Head Office and Branches.
• Perform other tasks assigned by supervisor.
• Other tasks will be assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor's degree in IT/MIS or related field
• Knowledge of SQL statement, PL/SQL programming and experience in using Oracle database and Redhat Linux.
• Very good in spoken and written English.
• Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, competence and motivation.
• Strong commitment to work and ability to work independently in a team spirit.

Job Description:
- Site survey the quantity, making BOQ, and any quantity calculation and costs for projects.

Job Description:
•	Providing a high-level customer service process to the Kofi’s active and potential customers
•	Monitoring and reporting customer inquiries and complaints to sales supervisor and manager
•	Work with related department to assist in follow up with any issues
•	Ensure that all new goods in showroom always clean
•	Handle stock on KOFI showroom ensuring it is correctly between report and stock on hand
•	Records all borrow items related stock on KOFI showroom and make sure all product available  for selling
•	Providing sale reports and customers’ visited showroom to supervisor and manager
•	Other duties as assigned by supervisor and manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Graduated Bachelor degree, major in Marketing or relevant
•	Computer Literacy Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Internet and Email
•	Good at customer service
•	Good at presentation skill & Strong internal personal skills.
Company Profile:
We import quality equipment & product all over the world to ensure you are only using the best. We also provide reliable after sales services to support you as you start your coffee business journey.

 Founded in 2009, KOFI is one of the largest company which distributes Espresso coffee, Espresso coffee machine, Syrup and other related coffee accessories in Cambodia. Our main priority is to focus on quality services, professionalism and integrity.

 We have expanded ourselves with 4 showrooms in difference provinces to better serve our customer all over Cambodia. With full coverage services in Phnom Penh, SiemReap, Sihanouk Vile and Battambang.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruiter  069 777 559 job@kofi.com.kh # 86, Mao Tse Toung Blvd,Boeung Trabek, Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  069 777 559

Job Description:
- Organizes, directs, and monitors daily activities of front desk staffs. 
- Ensures efficient, friendly, and professional guest registration, check-out; supervise front desk staffs to ensure that established procedures are followed.
- Establishes procedures, prepares and coordinates schedules, and expedites workflow.
- Assists with training, motivating, and rewarding front desk staffs.
- Reviews current day’s expected arrivals and checks all VIP and special request reservations. Reviews status of departures on a daily basis; relays all pertinent information to front desk staffs and other appropriate staff.
- Ensures all necessary reports and forms are completed daily.
- Performs front desk staffs responsibilities as needed to process guests expediently including but not limited to checking guest into hotel, responding to guest questions, resolving guest problems/complaints, making guest reservations, and checking guests out of hotel.
- Ensures that guests’ needs are fulfilled and their stay is as pleasurable as possible; assists with dining, or transportation reservations as needed.
- Monitors and maintains front desk area.
- Possesses and maintains thorough knowledge of hotel services, facilities, policies, and room rates and area’s attractions.
- Performs other duties as assigned by Manager
Job Requirement:
** Employer Benefit : 
- Competitive salary + Monthly service charges
- Staff Accommodation + 3 Meals per day 
- PH, AL, and all other leaves in accordance with the laws 
- Professional development opportunities
Company Profile:
Situated along the shores of picturesque Saracen Bay, La Passion by Achariyak extends up the tree-covered hillside of a 70,000- square meter nature preserve on Koh Rong Sanloem. From the powdery white sand beach and warm aquamarine waters to the seclusion and natural splendor of the jungle interior, Koh Rong Sanloem is deserving of its description as a ‘paradise island’ by visitors. La Passion is your gateway to an idyllic island of natural wonders.

La Passion is managed by Achariyak Hospitality. Achariyak in Khmer refers to the word “Wonders” that is commonly known among all the people of Cambodia as a reminder of the four pillars that stands for compassion, sympathy, equality and charity. At Achariyak we ensure that every project we develop we will be able to truly connect the people and the world around us the wonders of exceptional Cambodia hospitality for our customers but also giving back to our community to help them become what they are capable of being.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chrin Chanthou  098 31 31 30 / 099 31 31 30 / https://t.me/Chrin_Chanthou chanthou.chrin@achariyak.com Saracen Bay, Koh Rong Sanloem Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia. 098 31 31 30 / 099 31 31 30 / https://t.me/Chrin_Chanthou

Job Description:
• Control and lead all front office staff activities in order to work smoothly and make sure that all rooms are well prepared and cleared.
• Greets customers, providing a positive and friendly attitude.
• Ensures uniform and personal appearance are clean and professional.
• Anticipates and addresses guests’ service needs and thanks guests with genuine appreciation.
• Answers telephones using appropriate etiquette.
• Answers questions about available services, general property information and amenities.
• Develops and maintains positive working relationships with others.
• Do daily report to leader.
• Other tasks assigned by superior.
Job Requirement:
• Female and Male.
• Bachelor or Associated degree in tourism, management, administration or related field. 
• At least 2-3 years experience in customer service management or similar role.
• High sense of teamwork and positive attitude.
• Computer literate such as Word & Excel and Internet.
• Excellent customer service and interpersonal skills.
• Professional appearance.
• Quick learner and adaptability.
• English communication and writing.

Company Profile:
The Crown Group is a unified organization, and the divisions that make up the group share a common quality – the experience and insight to know how to accomplish anything, from the complex to the routine. Crown provides strategic assignment management services and complete relocations for multinational companies as well as government organizations. Crown’s people, experienced, expert, and on-hand in nearly 60 countries, support employees on assignment and private individuals embarking on a new life in a new place.  

Crown is also a significant force in corporate information management. With impressive facilities worldwide, Crown manages archiving, retrieval and secure management of information in physical and electronic format.

Our care for people and important information is matched by our delicacy in handling unique, sensitive and often priceless works of art. Through offices in the major art centers of the world, Crown’s experts in fine art provide services in the planning, handling and movement of art around the world.

Further divisions encompass more conventional logistics services from storing and managing wine collections, project management of oil and gas equipment, hotel refurbishments, and warehousing and distribution of luxury goods.

With offices in more than 265 locations and in every continent, Crown naturally has a global perspective. We recognize that in the delivery of our services, we also bear a responsibility to our communities and the environment, worldwide. Our commitment to our customers is matched by a sincere and wide-ranging CSR program, supporting health, education and welfare projects as well as our continual efforts to improve the environmental performance of all our operations.

The Crown Worldwide Group, headquartered in Hong Kong, was established in 1965. Due to our continued expansion, Crown Worldwide is currently looking for the position of Records Management Services Sales Consultant in Ho Chi Minh City Office.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  +855 77 655 171/ 93 365 415 msolinkanhaka@crownww.com Samrong Village, Sangkat Khmounh,Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia +855 77 655 171/ 93 365 415

job title: Assistant Manager- Asset and Cost Control
position: Assistant Manager- Asset and Cost Control
Job Description: The role of Asset Management comes with significant responsibility, and this should be articulated in Asset Management job description by listing some of the following duties and tasks:•	Manages and tracks whole asset of company  •	Creates asset master data into system by ensuing assignment to the correct cost center, asset Class, location, and depreciation method.•	Prints coding sticker to each physical asset •	Records Asset movement such as Asset transfer, return, scrape and disposal •	Checks and verify asset request and ensure an issuance asset to requestor following the requisition timely.•	Prepares daily/monthly report for asset management to manager when required•	Works with department head to perform asset count or spot check to ensure asset are located the right place and department. •	Reconciles daily/monthly/yearly GL accounts relating to Asset posting •	Perform/posts monthly asset depreciation and simulate all amount and GL before posting to accounting.  •	Maintains asset documentation and keep on the proper folder•	Assists to provide timely any asset duty to manager such as paying property tax, licenses, and other annual payment under asset management. •	Regularly communicates to asset owners to ensure they use asset in a proper way and taking care asset. •	Support Purchase team to calculate materials planned prices such as raw materials, packaging material and additive materials including purchase cost, inflation, exchange rate and logistic cost, from purchase order till good receipt plan. •	Supports Production team to identify manufacturing overhead cost such as labor cost, electricity and water consumption by production line and interpret them into cost. •	Sets up and allocates manufacturing overhead cost structure and assessment cycle into system to drill down to the semi and finish goods levels.•	Calculate standard activities types rate and maintain it in system on timely basis.  •	Release product costing into system and ensure semi and finish goods costing lots are updated and maintain with the correct profit center, date, and product hierarchy.•	Performs monthly actual product costing calculation and settlement based on production order complying with guidelines of month end check list.•	Closes production order from previous month after settlement and calculate actual production cost.•	Prepares and analyses standard Vs. actual cost, investigates the production variance and highlight significant variances including usage and price.•	Conduct inventory analysis on a Job Description:
- Develops and implements the Retail Business’s Shop, Service and partners
- Coordinate with regional team on specific adaptation/ projects/ standard for implementation in all Shop, service and partners activities with Retail Service Station
- Develop and implement a sales and marketing strategy for the Shop, service and partners business in order for the company to maintain sustainable growth and profitability in its retail operations in the market which covering Shop, service and partners, Kiosk rental business, Car Care Product and Lube inside the shop space rental for ATM and other food partner businesses at all the stations. This is to improve sales/margin, increased Shop, service and partners revenue
- Initiate and develop the attractive marketing; also to bring up the idea how to attractive the customers from fuel forecourt to buy in our shop and other service activities; and promotional strategy for all sale activities (Shop, service and partners) in conjunction with Marketing and communication department
- Have a proper Shop, service and partners segmentation and renovation plan for all locations, and if require upgrade them
- Fast track development of Shop, service and partner businesses in conjunction with local and regional support team
- Optimize profitability include franchise fee, rental, minimize loss/gain and other income from all locations including the partnerships with the listed suppliers.
- Analysis of Shop and service business report (turn over, revenue, best/fast selling/slow, supplier, for Bonjour Shop, CCP (inside shop), wash business, lubricant (inside shop),
space rental and other non-fuel activities and also provide action to bring in new and attractive items to add inside the shop for sale
- Develop market intelligent and keep on study about competitor’s development plan and their strategy and position ourself into this competition market
- Promote brand awareness of the company into the public and ensure the penetration into every city of Cambodia, also work on strategy to have the attractive items to sell in the Shop, service and partners
- Define a clear strategy for partnerships in shops (supply, branding…) sets the objectives and coordinates and supervises a team of Category Managers and of Merchandisers.
- Creates and updates the Shop, service and partners tools: POS system, product assortment, flow charts, zero shortage sheet etc.

- Manage, control and evaluate the quality of customer service, and top service
- Work closely with TMs and other involved team through the monthly analysis of Shop, service and partners turnover per activity and per family
- Analyze the market for partnership possibilities and work on different business models with partners to improve Shop, service and partners business
- Ensure the general principle outlined in HACCP food hygiene procedure is to be implemented within the business unit
- Ensure point of contract for retail business line in terms of food hygiene, Identifies challenges surrounding food safety (Financial, Commercial, Technical, Human)
- Manage quarterly business review with GM of Retail Business and Optimization and other related team on performance
- Actively involved on digital and other projects assigned by General Manager of Retail Business
- Ensure to follow 100% standard (business and marketing for the new set up (or renovation) Shop, service and partners
- Regularly organizes business review/meeting with the General Manager of Retail Business and other related department
- Other duties assigned by General Manager of Retail Business

distribution

Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

Job Description:
To coach and lead a team of accounting and finance staff (accounting, controlling, and billing).
• Manage day to day accounting/ finance function of the business units.
• To manage the month end/year end process to ensure SAP and HFM (group reporting) are in
compliance with IFRS and are submitted according to the gategroup’s reporting timeline
• To manage forecast, budget & business plan, and other internal reporting processes.
• To ensure accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of customer billing. Also, to ensure receivables are
collected from customers on a timely fashion.
• To review and monitor the cash flow and prepare regular cash flow forecasts/ input in the Treasury
Management system (TMS).
• To manage Capital Expenditure requests.
• To manage Commercial Tender file preparation process.
• Prepare bank reconciliations and manage bank relationship,
• To review and approve company payments on regular basis.
• To monitor expenditure monthly and propose cost saving measures.
• Report customer profitability, receivables through the Business Warehouse system.
• To manage all local tax matters (payroll, sales, withholding etc.,.). These would include calculation/
submission to local tax authorities as such.
• To ensure compliance of accounting and other finance related policies and internal controls system
with local laws/ regulations and Group standard (IFRS, GG authority manual and policies). This will
also include internal and external audit compliance.
• To implement improvements to accounting/ finance processes.
Job Requirement:
* Education:
• Degree with CPA or ACCA Qualified
* Work Experience:
• Experience preferably in FMCG, Manufacturing, Catering or Aviation
• Strong leadership and change management experience
Technical Skills: (Certification, Licenses and Registration)
• SAP and Hyperion Experience
Language / Communication Skills:
• English Strong verbal and written communication skills.
• Be able to engage with key stakeholders at all levels
• Ability to analyze problem and deliver appropriate solution.
• Ability to influence outcomes and manage change

* An Excellent benefit package and competitive salary will be offer to successful candidates.
* All Candidates should submit the documents, CV, Cover Letter stating expect salary to:
