Job Description: • Manages and organizes asset master data, (preferably) within the SAP. Sets up the asset breakdown structure down to the required maintainable item level, and defines all PM tasks and inventory items in SAP according to the master data standards. Implements management system.• Monitors asset performance (OPI or line availability). Responsible for plant availability (uptime).• Introduces basic maintenance plans for all equipment  • Sets up basic spare part segmentation and define critical spares.• No change (MOC) or modification activities, only restore to basic condition activities.• Collects and manages asset drawings, documents, permits (licenses), and warranties.• Conducts Tagging if required or appropriate (e.g. calibration tags).• Supports sourcing strategy, i.e. sets up basic maintenance supplier agreements and/or SLA's.• Supports the Engineering manager to conduct the plan and execution of brewery CAPEX's.• Supports engineering manager (EM) in maintaining electrical & automation master plan.• Supports engineering manager (EM) and reports to the EM in initiating and driving the basic maintenance processes and restoring basic condition.• Feeds planning team leader and maintenance planner with preventive maintenance plans and plans to restore assets to basic condition.• Mentors and trains production technicians in restoring the basic conditions to the assets in their production zones.• Mentors and trains production technicians in executing breakdown analysis.• Performs loss & cost maintenance deployments to shop floor level and establishes PDCA process.• Assesses current equipment condition and develops restoration plan to eliminate sporadic loss.• Supports the improvement of basic standards for safety, process, and quality and ensures compliance.• Implements systematic breakdown analysis and reduction system (BDA).• Monitors impact of PM activities (MTBF, MTBS, MTBA, …) and supports countermeasures to improve preventive maintenance (PM) and autonomous maintenance (AM) roll-out.• Starts improvement on focus equipment to eliminate abnormalities and develops basic skills in maintenance and operating teams via training.• Key-user of the SAP. OPI (and other ME-) data registration in the SAP.• Maintains automation backup data (parameters, PLC, HMI, etc.).• Reports on maintenance KPIs, i.e. % assets restored to basic condition, nr. of breakdowns, % ABC analysis complete, OPI score and/or line performance, % PM plans OTIF, and % asset master data as built.
Job Requirement: • Education: Preferably Bachelor level in plant electrical & automation • Experiences: Minimum of 3 years in Plant electrical & automation and managing of people • Skills: General knowledge of maintenance engineering processes, i.e. have basic knowledge of cost driver and performance killer analysis, ABC criticality ranking, preventive maintenance, critical spare parts selection, item segmentation & inventory management, and asset performance management.• Good knowledge of maintenance operations and SAP (i.e. asset master data key-user and becoming/training for asset master data expert).• Excellent technical maintenance analysis- and reporting skills.• People management and leadership.• Facilitating skills/ability to organize and facilitate workshops for multidisciplinary teams.• TPM / Lean / 6 Sigma, etc.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Job Description:
IT support: Your main responsible in system operating and supporting. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on deploying, operating to ensure the system works well 24/7 as well as support fixing and resolving errors/problems timely:

-	Cooperate to test, deploy and operate the system.

-	Implement protections, patching on Applications, Systems, and Devices.
-	Installation and use of firewalls, data encryption and other security products and procedures
-	Conduct periodic network scans to find any vulnerability
-	Conduct penetration testing, simulating an attack on the system to find exploitable weaknesses

-	Have good knowledge in security (domain controller, antivirus, iptables...)
-	Have good knowledge in networking (configuration switch, Firewall, Load Banlancer, ...)
-	Have experiences in working with database (Oracle, MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL ...)
-	Be proactive at work, good at teamwork
-	Be flexible, honestly, hard-working, be able to work under pressure and high responsibility
-	Be able to learn and research more about new technology
-	Be fluent in English listening, speaking, reading and writing.

+	Have knowledge, understanding or experience working on one of bank / finance / payment / e wallet field.

Job Description:
Now we are looking for BA (Business Analyst) who will play a central role in building out theo large-scale intelligent products, services in finance for eMoney Company. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on defining product features, design and implement the best features, the main works of BA including:
-	Gather business and system requirements from stakeholders such as end-user, partner, client...Assist client in defining requirements and suggest ideas
-	To analyze business requirements and to propose optimal solution to clients.
-	Writing and preparing URS (user requirement specification), SRS (software requirement specification) documents for systems to be developed for the project engineering department and for the customer to use;
-	Building prototype of products to be developed to introduce and make more clear with client, development team as well as related parties
-	Discuss/communicate with key users/stakeholders to ensure the requirements fully documented and communicated properly.
-	Communicating content, assisting project members, project managers to clarify customer requirements to meet; organizing guidance, training, support for users to use the product and troubleshooting when problems occur.
-	Acting as the bridge between client and project team to clarify requirement with development team (developers, UI designer, testers…) both business and system analysis view as well as the bridge among internal team
-	Support in testing, participate in coordination with tester to check development results, to ensure compliance with agreed content requirements.
Job Requirement:
** SKILL & REQUIREMENT FOR BA (BUSINESS ANALYST)
-	Have bachelor / engineer in IT, computer science or equivalent.
-	Must be good at speaking, listening, reading and writing in English.
-	Ability to analyze, solve problems, express problems from general to specific details, coherently and clearly.
-	Must have knowledge about software development process as well as software diagrams in UML. Have experience in using modeling tool such as MS Visio, UML… and prototype/Mockup tools 
-	MUST have experience in reading, analyzing, developing diagrams (UML) and have experience in writing software documents such as URS, SRS, user-guide document.
-	Strong interpersonal and communication skills, both oral and written. Able to express ideas clearly and concisely

+	Have experience in testing or business analysis.
+	Have experience working on different development lifecycle.

team

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training

Job Description: - Prepare tender and contract documents, including bill of quantities.- Undertake cost analysis for repair, maintenance project work.- Assist in establishing client’s requirement and undertake feasibility studies.- Perform risk, value management and cost control.- Advise on procurement strategy.- Identify, analyze and develop responses to commercial risks.- Prepare and analyses costing’s for tenders.- Allocate work to contractors.- Provide design guidance to client and colleagues as well as construction staff to adapt - Read and interpret blueprints.- Negotiate prices.- Source all suppliers to search materials selection.- Follow up with suppliers to ensure design specifications have been met.- Always do the site inspection to make sure the construction meet the company’s standard.- Using computer programs such as AutoCAD architecture, Sketch up pro, creative suites at very good level or higher.- Organize and lead involved teams to produce documents on time for management’s requirement.- Make cash-flow report and budget projection for perspective projects.- Other tasks assigned by C&D director.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree of related construction field.- Master’s degree is more preferred.- Minimum 4 years of experience in Quantity Surveying Work.- Master/Bachelor’s degree of related construction field.- Good command of reading, writing and speaking English.- Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft project), and other programs related to skills involved.- Track on actual site compare to construction schedule.- Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.- Measurement of actual work for claim.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description: Job Goals:The Head of Administration and Human Resources (A&H) or HR & Admin Manager is responsible for recommendation of HR Strategies, as well as the execution of approved and adopted policies of the company. The Head of A&H will ensure the implementation of approved sound and best-fit HR practices, lead efficient delivery of HR services, and drive employee engagement with impact on organizational performance.The Head of A&H will also supervise key support functions including Administration, Facility and Security Management, ensuring efficiency and service excellence. The Head of A&H will report to the Head of the Support Department, and the CEO.Main Responsibilities:1.	Strategic HR Management-	Recommend and implement approved HR strategies, plans, budgets to support the attainment of corporate goals including the management of budgets and resources.-	Drive the adoption of sound and best-fit HR practices; develop and implement supporting HR policies and procedures.-	Lead the design and implementation of the frameworks and programs for talent acquisition and management, organizational development, employee engagement, compensation, and benefits, learning and development, performance management etc. towards optimizing workforce performance and strengthening employee value proposition.-	Manages the talent acquisition process, which may include recruitment, interviewing, and hiring of qualified job applicants, particularly for managerial, exempt, and professional roles; collaborates with section heads and department heads to understand skills and competencies required for openings.-	Creates learning and development programs and initiatives that provide internal development opportunities for employees.-	Provides support and guidance to HR generalists, management, and other staffs when complex, specialized, and sensitive questions and issues arise; may be required to administer and execute routine tasks in delicate circumstances such as investigating allegations of wrongdoing, and terminations.-	Facilitate culture definition, articulation, and communication; deploy appropriate practices and policies to ensure the appropriate culture is imbibed and entrenched within the company.-	Provide professional advice and insights to management and staff on people management practices and decisions.-	Oversees employee disciplinary meetings, terminations, and investigations.-	Track and monitor HR performance in line with defined goals and metrics; deploy appropriate interventions where necessary.-	Collaborate across functions for effective business operation.2.	General Administration-	Supervise general administration including building, security, and hygiene management; facilitate and ensure the provision of high-quality services.-	Control and manage the deployment and use of assets as approved by management.-	Monitor and ensure timely maintenance of the company’s facility and assets, adherence to safety standards and applicable compliance requirements.-	Recommend and implement approved policies and procedures to support service delivery.-	Manage vendors and service providers; undertake negotiations and relevant contract management and ensure delivery in line with agreement.
Job Requirement: Minimum Requirements:-	Minimum of five years relevant experience with at least three years in managerial capacity.-	Minimum of a bachelor’s degree or equivalent.-	MBA or relevant master’s degree would be an added advantage.-	Professional HR qualification.-	Experience across HR disciplines including organizational development, talent management, recruitment, compensation, and benefits, learning and development, employee relations, and development and implementation of HR policies.-	Experience providing HR advisory support at management level and driving change.Required Skills/Abilities:-	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.-	Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.-	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.-	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.-	Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.-	Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.-	Thorough knowledge of employment-related laws and regulations.-	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.-	Proficiency with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Phohunhuy Veasna   017 281 185 / 086 761 831 (Telegram) recruitment@ics.edu.kh Phnom Penh  #14, street 214, Sangkat Boeung Raing, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 017 281 185 / 086 761 831 (Telegram)

job title: ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាលព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាលព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
IT/ADMIN ASSISTANT ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាលផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការដោះស្រាយប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពជាមួយ ក្រុមIT និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាប្រតិបត្តិការរដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។ ជួយផ្តល់ការគាំទ្រទូទៅដល់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់លើប្រព័ន្ធដែលមាន និងដំណើរការពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល។ ការគ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារ និងការធ្វើរសំណើរផ្សេងៗដែលផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាចាំបាច់ត្រូវការ។ម្យ៉ាងវិញទៀតគាត់នឹងធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ និងក្រុមIT ដែលមានមូលដ្ឋាននៅគ្រប់សាខា ជាងបាក់ វណ្ណហុង។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
I. Main purpose of the job 
1. ការគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ឯកសារទាក់ទងនឹងផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា។
2. បង្កើតសំណើនៅពេលដែលនាយកដ្ឋានព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាត្រូវការដូចជា៖ ការទិញគ្រឿងបន្ថែម IT ការបន្តអាជ្ញាប័ណ្ណ ការបន្តកិច្ចសន្យា ។ល។
3. ជួយបុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់ក្នុងផ្នែក IT ជាមួយនឹងសំណើទិញ ហើយបន្តការបង់ប្រាក់(Renew License or contract) OT ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភអាហារ និងការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងទៀត។
4. ផ្តល់ការជួយដល់សាខា និងនាយកដ្ឋានទាំងអស់សម្រាប់ការស្នើសុំជួសជុលឧបករណ៍អាយធី។
5. ធ្វើការជាមួយអ្នកលក់ និងលទ្ធកម្មសម្រាប់សំណើទាក់ទងនឹងការដំឡើង ឬផ្លាស់ទីកន្លែង ការតភ្ជាប់អ៊ីនធឺណិត ម៉ាស៊ីនស្គែនស្នាមម្រាមដៃ និងបន្ទប់ប្រជុំ។
6. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានរាល់សំណើទាំងអស់នៅក្នុងដំណើរការរបស់ប្រពន្ធ័ HelpDesk ដើម្បីប្រាកដថាសេវាកម្មនោះត្រូវនឹងគោលការណ៍។
7. ដំណើរការទទួលទំនិញសម្រាប់សេវាកម្ម IT ដូចជាម៉ាស៊ីនព្រីនធ័រជួល ការភ្ជាប់អ៊ីនធឺណិតសម្រាប់ CBVH ការបន្តអាជ្ញាប័ណ្ណ Office 365 ។
8. ធ្វើការជាមួយនឹងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាទាក់ទងនឹងការស្នើសុំអោយដោយបញ្ហាឧបករណ៍អាយធី លុបចោលឯកសារ និងការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត។
9. ចូលរួមជាមួយក្រុមIT ដើម្បីធានាថាសំណើទិញគម្រោងរបស់ IT រវាងក្រុមលទ្ធកម្ម និងក្រុមគម្រោងធានាថាត្រឹមត្រូវ។
10. តាមដាន និងជូនដំណឹងអំពីស្ថានភាពគម្រោង(Projects)។
11. Call Center និងគ្រប់គ្រងភារកិច្ចរបស់អ្នកបច្ចេកទេស។

Qualified applicants may submit their CVs and cover letters to the Human Resources Department. 
The Human Resources Department
CamGSM Co., Ltd.
No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh
Tel. 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555
Email: careers@cellcard.com.kh
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse

- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ៖- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ៣ ឆ្នាំឡើង- មានបទពិសោធន៍ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារសម្រេចតាមផែនការ- អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ- ចេះ សរសេរ និងអានភាសាខ្មែរ បានល្អ- ឧស្សាហ៍ ព្យាយាម និងស្មោះត្រង់ក្នុងការងារអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ និងពាក់កណ្តាលថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ - សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Prepare in the implementation of the “Project Execution Plan’- Prepare in the preparation and management of overview and strategic programs, including design, procurement and construction schedules together with supporting information required schedules- Coordinate and manage the preparation and development of target construction and procurement schedules together with associated information required schedules- Establish and agree project reporting procedures, prepare and present monthly project progress- Review the schedules and related documents from the contractor including monthly reports and analyses the content to ensure compliance with project objectives- Review schedule trends to identify problem areas and recommend corrective action to management.  Monitor actual progress against planned progress- Monitor engineering cost estimation, material and equipment procurement and construction and commissioning status- Prepare progress monitoring tools for the management and monitoring of the above-mentioned schedules.  Monitor progress both on and off site.  Identify deviations (progress trends) in both construction and procurement progress and suggest possible courses of corrective action- Working closely with the design and Project Teams to ensure that the ‘contract program is feasible, complies with the Project Master Plan and contractual documents- Interface on a daily basis with the main contractor sub-contractors and internal management.- Carry out studies into scheduling, manning and material flow as needed- Attend offsite meetings as requested by the client- Review schedules for slippage of key dates- Assist in the defense / approval of any claim for time extension or major change to the schedule- Other duties as requested from time to time- Ensuring that each Scheduling Engineer runs his or her section to the highest professional standards, that all information is current, and that every member of the team is receiving the information he or she needs to fulfil their responsibilities.- Establish and maintain consistent and adequate administration procedures, in their field.  These procedures will be followed across the project by the respective planners working under the Construction Managers.- Participate with the project management team, as directed by GM, to achieve project deliverables.- Issue high-level schedule weekly updates- Identify and report main issues interfering with progress- Identify and report on measures for improving schedule performance- Coordinate with Planning Managers on all aspects of the work- Provide all time related information to the Scheduling Manager- Follow the procedures, tools, templates, instruction, etc. issued by the Scheduling Manager.- Monitor the timing of submittals against schedule requirements- Assist in the preparation and management of overview and strategic programs, including design, procurement and construction schedules together with supporting information required schedules.- Schedules plans and oversees the entire program of work- Plans, organizes, and coordinates planning activities- Selects the most appropriate techniques and logical sequence of activities to complete project scope- Inputs the work breakdown structure information in means to assess an accurate forecast on time, resources and cash flow of the project- Determines appropriate logistics solution in managing resources- Sets up alerts for all important contractual and milestone dates- Prepares cash flow, charts and histograms on planning projects- Verifies critical path and interfaces between design/ engineering/ procurement / execution- Monitors progress periodically and compares it with the baseline planning- Updates the schedule based on inputs received from project team- Monitoring QA/QC/QS process - Monitoring project cost and project BoQs- Monitoring construction material is the site and Wearhouse
Job Requirement: - Degree in Civil/MEP Engineering from a recognized University - Minimum of 12 - 15 years of relevant work experience in building construction works.- Solid communication and negotiation skills- Other skills - Project management - Problem solving - Primavera and Microsoft Project applications knowledge is essential- Knowledge of International Organization for Standardization quality systems- Experience inspection and checking for all quality related procedures in the site and ensures activity at the site is as per approved method statement and inspection test plan.- Experience/understanding project cash flowHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Royal De Heus Group is an international organization with a leading position in the animal feed industry. De Heus was founded in 1911 and has its roots in the Netherlands. After more than a 100 years the company is still owned and managed by the De Heus family.

Since its founding Royal De Heus has expanded from a regional feed company to a feed conglomerate with activities in more than 50 countries in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Due to the rapid growth outside the Netherlands the De Heus Group is a global top-15 feed supplier.

De Heus is establishing their production facility in Cambodia and jointing venture together with TMH Company Limited of Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   (855) 96 781 1888, (855) 12 726 771 uka.sun@deheus.com Street: 51, Preah Sre Commune, Oudong District, Kampong Speu  Province, Cambodia. (855) 96 781 1888, (855) 12 726 771

Job Description: • Finance Manager will be in charge of three functions (i) Finance & Accounting, (ii) Costing & Budgeting, and (iii) Analyzing Data. • Finance Manager is a key player within the above three functions and will work alongside Managing Directors. • He/she is responsible for controlling the financial accounting, reporting, and analysis. • Develop, prepare, analyze and update on costing, cash flow projection, and business plan for the Group’s businesses. • Closely monitor the expenditures of each department, comparing variances from budgeting to actual spending across checking each department's activities and set of objectives. • Analyze discrepancies by work package between Budget and Actuals and provide analysis of the project's margin and expenditures. • Alert as soon as possible to the top management of insignificant variances on all projects (quantity, costs, actuals or budgeting, deviation of initial objectives). • Produce monthly financial reports including balance sheet, P&L, Cash Flows, expenses, stock… • Develop and update policies, procedures, and manuals for Accounting & Finance, Costing & Budgeting, and Stock.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field. • Minimum 3 years of work experience in a management role in the related field (F&B is a plus) • English proficiency and Good interpersonal skills • At ease with databases and very good knowledge of Excel, Presentation, and Reporting • Research and analytical skills • Advanced time management skills including the ability to program and schedule the time of others• Intermediate organizational skills with the ability to implement system and procedures to ensure efficient and transparent process, costing and budgeting • Advanced financial and budgetary skills
Company Profile: COLOR CUP, which has been in business for almost 5 years, is one of the leading and biggest local outdoor pubs, founded by Cambodian shareholders with the goal of creating a recognizable local brand in the kingdom. position: បុគ្គលិកជំនួយការគ្រូបង្រៀននៅសាខាមត្តេយ្យសិក្សា / Teacher Assistants for Kindergarten
Job Description: ការប្រកាសជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកជំនួយការគ្រូបង្រៀននៅសាលារៀនអន្តរជាតិផារ៉ាហ្គន សាខាមត្តេយ្យសិក្សា  កាតព្វកិច្ច និងតួនាទី៖  ជួយបញ្ចុកអាហារកុមារ និងប្ដូរខោទឹកនោម  រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពរយៈពេលវែង និងរយៈពេលខ្លី សម្រាប់កុមារពេញមួយថ្ងៃ  លើកទឹកចិត្តកុមារឱ្យចូលរួមសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងកម្សាន្តនានា  សង្កេត និងតាមដាន ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវផាសុកភាព និងជួយដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗរបស់កុមារ  ជួយកុមារក្នុងការញ៉ាំអាហារ និងប្រើប្រាស់គ្រឿងបរិក្ខារសាលា  ធានាបាននូវផាសុកភាពទាំងផ្លូវកាយ និងផ្លូវចិត្តដល់កុមារ ដោយបង្កើតនូវបរិស្ថានមានសុវត្ថិភាពជូនពួកគាត់  មើលថែកុមារនៅក្នុង និងក្រៅថ្នាក់រៀន ក៏ដូចជាក្នុងអំឡុងដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សានានាផងដែរ  ជួយកុមារទាំងក្នុងសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងសិល្បៈ  ជួយ និងមើលថែកុមារ ក្នុងអំឡុងម៉ោងញ៉ាំបាយ និងអាហារសម្រន់  ជួយរក្សាអនាម័យកុមារ ជាពិសេសកុមារតូចៗ ឬកុមារដែលមានតម្រូវការពិសេស ដូចជាការប្ដូរខោទឹកនោម ឬជួយពួកគាត់ប្រើប្រាស់បន្ទប់ទឹកជាដើម  យកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើសុខភាពផ្លូវចិត្ត និងការអភិវឌ្ឍរបស់កុមារ ដោយត្រូវរាយការណ៍បញ្ហាផ្សេងៗជូនគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់  ចាត់ចែងសកម្មភាពសម្អាត និងថែទាំថ្នាក់រៀន ដោយធានាថា សម្ភារៈដែលអាចបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ផ្សេងៗគឺត្រូវបានយកចេញសព្វគ្រប់ និងរួចរាល់ នៅមុខពេលកុមារចូលក្នុងថ្នាក់រៀន  ជួយមើលថែកុមារ នៅពេលពួកគាត់ចេញចូលទីធ្លាសាលា  អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ ● អាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់នៅសាលាដោយឥតគិតថ្លៃ ● ការធានារ៉ាប់រងពីបេឡាជាតិសន្ដិសុខសង្គមផ្នែកថែទាំសុខភាព ● ឈប់សម្រាកដោយទទួលបានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល ស្របតាមប្រតិទិនឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ● ឈប់សម្រាកវិស្សមកាលប្រចាំឆ្នាំរយៈពេល ២០ ថ្ងៃ ដោយទទួលបានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល
Job Requirement: Teaching Assistant Job Requirements at Paragon International School Kindergarten Campus Help children in feeding, and changing diapers Plan long and short-term activities to engage children throughout the course of the day Encourage children to take part in class and recreational activities Observe and monitor children to ensure that they are comfortable and intervene following signs of distress Assist older children in partaking their meals and using the facilities Ensure the physical and emotional comfort of children by providing them a safe environment Supervising children within the facility as well as during outdoor playtime and field trips Assisting children in their activities, including educational and artistic projects Supervising and assisting children during meals and snacks Assisting with hygiene and, in the case of younger or special needs children, changing diapers or assisting with using the toilet Paying attention to a children's emotional state and development, reporting concerns to a homeroom teacher. Handle cleaning and maintenance activities of the classroom and ensure that any hazardous materials are discarded before children arrive Assisting children in and out times.Benefits:●        Free lunch at school●        National Social Security Fund Medical insurance●        Paid public holidays●        Paid a 20-day holiday
Company Profile: Paragon International School (Paragon ISC) is one of Cambodia's international/bilingual schools, enrolling over 1100 students. Paragon ISC is controlled by The School Board. The administration and teaching staff represent over 20 different countries. The average teaching experience of Paragon ISC teachers is over 10 years. Our primary focus is on internationalism in order to create open-minded world citizens who have an international perspective, are self-confident and conscientious, and who can function as leaders and team members in societies all over the world.Paragon ISC is certified by the Cambodian Ministry of Education and it is accredited by CIS (Council of International Schools). Paragon ISC is also a  Cambridge Exams and PD Centre. Students may enter Cambridge tests and receive a certificate.Paragon ISC graduates have been accepted at many prestigious universities around the world, such as Australia, Japan, New Zealand, USA and more.
Contact Info: Contact Information Paragon International School  +855 (23) 72 72 82 cv@paragonisc.edu.kh Phnom Penh St: 317, No: 66, Toul Kork Boeng Kok 2 quarter +855 (23) 72 72 82

Job Description: - Diagnosing and treating illnesses, medical conditions, and injuries.- Ordering, performing, and interpreting diagnostic tests.- Collecting, recording, and maintaining patients' information and histories.- Prescribing and administering treatments, therapies, medications, vaccinations, and other specialized medical care.- Explaining procedures and discussing test results or prescribed treatments with patients and family members.- Monitoring patients' conditions and progress.-  Directing, coordinating, consulting with, and referring patients to nurses, students, assistants, specialists, therapists, and other medical staff.Advising patients, parents, and guardians on diets, activities, hygiene, and disease prevention.Conducting research and remaining up to date on current trends, discoveries, and developments in the field.
Job Requirement: - Pediatric Specialist - Superb organizational and time management skills.- Excellent decision-making skills and communication.- Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.- Compassionate nature with the ability to make patients feel at ease.- Great management and leadership skills.- A caring and compassionate nature when working with children and their families.- Location : Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh - Salary rank : $1.5K-$2K- Industry : Medical Clinic

Job Description:
The Assistant Manager is someone who is passionate about food and customer service. They are a problem solver with strong work ethic and leadership skills. The Assistant Manager understands that customer satisfaction always takes priority but efficient restaurant operations make it possible. They are experienced leader with a goal to move up in the management field.

** Responsibilities
• Identify and delegate responsibilities to supervisor and staff to ensure objectives are met and excellent service is consistently achieved
• Effectively manage the restaurant in absence of Restaurant Manager
• Manage operations with passion, integrity and knowledge while promoting the culture and values of Stonegrill
• Provide direction to Supervisors and staff to achieve restaurant goals
• Consistently review operations and staff to identify any problems, concerns and opportunities for improvement
• Provide coaching and feedback to mangers and staff and assess performance on and ongoing basis
• Create a positive guest experience by delivering a high level of service and ensuring all staff engage guests to understand their needs and exceed expectations
• Manage the restaurant to meet or exceed in food quality, safety and cleanliness
• Solicit guest feedback to understand the needs and wants of customers
• Train and coach staff on guest services principles and practices
• Monitor and maintain the POS system
• Assist in menu implementation
• Develop and implement creative solutions to areas of improvement
• Assist in conducting staff and daily pre-shift meetings
• Assist in any areas of the restaurant when staffing constraints
• Identify employee weaknesses and retrain as necessary
Duties
• Supervising daily shift operations
• Monitor communication between floor and kitchen
• Monitor customer service to each table, ensuring food and drinks are delivered on time and correctly
• Monitor customers lack of service
• Ensure fast processing of bills
• Monitor and ensure cleanliness of floors, glasses, tables, cutlery, bar and toilets
Job Requirement:
• Able to use touch-sensistive POS System
• Must be able to take direction and delegate responsibilities
• Able to work in a fast paced environtment
• Able to work nights, weekends and holidays

job title: គ្រូថែទាំកុមារ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូថែទាំកុមារ
Job Description: - រៀបចំបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្សប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្មចម្លងវេនសិក្សា និងទូដាក់សម្ភារសិស្ស (Locker)។- ផ្ញើចំនួនសិស្សជូនគណៈកម្មការកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សាជាប្រចាំខែ។- រៀបចំបែងចែកចំនួនសិស្សទៅតាមបន្ទប់នីមួយៗ។- រៀបចំកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សា (កម្មវិធីចូលបណ្ណាល័យ កុំព្យូទ័រ សោតទស្សន៍) និងរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។- រៀបចំអនាម័យ និងថែរក្សាសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងបន្ទប់គេង។- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកអាហារដ្ឋានរៀបចំមុខម្ហូប។- គ្រប់គ្រងការប្រើប្រាស់ទូ Locker ទៅតាមចំនួនសិស្សដែលទទួលសេវាកម្ម។- ស្នើសុំជួសជុល ឬចម្លងសោនៅពេលបាត់ ឬខូច។- ស្នើចំនួនអាហារទៅផ្នែកអាហារដ្ឋានជាប្រចាំទៅតាមចំនួនសិស្សដែលត្រូវញុំា។- ពិនិត្យអវត្តមានសិស្សពេលញុំា និងពេលគេង។- រៀបចំការប្រជុំរៀងរាល់ពេលមុនចប់ Term។- រាល់ពេលមុនចប់ Term សហការជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យរៀបចំលិខិតចែកសិស្សបញ្ជាក់ពីការបង់ប្រាក់- ផ្ញើទិន្នន័យសិស្សរាល់ផុតសុពលភាពបង់ប្រាក់ទៅផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។- ចូលរួមផ្សព្វផ្សាយរាល់ពេលដើមនៃឆមាសនីមួយៗតាមថ្នាក់ស្តីពីសេវាកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សា និងទូដាក់សម្ភារសិស្ស (Locker)។- រៀបចំទុកដាក់ឯកសារទៅតាមកន្លែងដែលបានរៀបចំ។- សហការជាមួយគណៈកម្មការនូវការងារដែលបានដាក់ជូន។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- បញ្ចប់វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល- បានទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលចិត្តសាស្រ្តកុមារ និងវិធីសាស្រ្តក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ញាជាមួយសិស្ស។- មានបទពិសោធធ្វើការជាមួយកុមារ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ និងជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564 ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

• Primarily responsible for business development

AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Corporate Solution Product and Pricing support (50%)
- Generate quotation for Corporate Solution products
within the turnaround time.
- Assist sales team with special requests.
- Assist with experience monitoring for the Corporate
Solution products.
- Collaborate with various functional departments to
assist with product and pricing related enquiries.
2. Provide actuarial support for new product/ initiative launch (20%)
- Develop and propose product pricing template
based on market and sales proposition.
- Develop product approval document, user
requirements and other related documents before new product go live.
- Review and provide feedbacks for training
materials, product submission documents to MEF and marketing materials to ensure they are align with the product pricing model.
- UAT testing on iPos to make sure the premium calculation, all related wording or sentences in the sales quotation are fully align with the product pricing model.
- UAT testing on IL/COAST system to make sure they are all align with the product pricing model.
3. Support product enhancement related projects (20%)
- Support the system testing and UAT for day2 items.
- Support day2 feature such as requests for change
payment mode, change sum insured and premium after policy issue.
4. Other actuarial related support (10%)
- Monthly tracking of the new product after launch.
- Calculate persistency for each sale channel for
monthly reporting and compensation schemes calculation.
- Handling other related customer service queries.
- Mentoring actuarial analyst and intern for the BAU
tasks and support required.
Job Requirement:
• Education – Bachelor’s in Actuarial Mathematics/ Mathematics/Statistics or related fields. (Minimum 3.0 GPA)
• Experience – minimum 3 years of working experience.
(Insurance or Actuarial related preferred) (Experience with
group product is preferred)
• Special skills – Ability to think analytically, strong business knowledge, self-initiative and demonstrate commitment to high quality deliverables, strong team player and serious to pursue Actuarial career.
Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more.

position: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ
Job Description: ១. សមត្ថភាពបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យក)- ការងារគរុកោសល្យ  (ការបង្រៀន)- គោរពម៉ោងពេលបង្រៀនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំ- បង្កើត និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជាប្រចាំលើបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគ្រប់កម្រិតដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀនឱ្យស្របតាមបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគោលរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង              - អនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំលើការកសាង/ អភិវឌ្ឍន៍/កែសម្រួល លើកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ/ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍- ផលិត និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវសម្ភារឧបទេស (ការបង្កើតដោយផ្ទាល់ដៃ ឬការ ទិញស្រាប់) ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងខ្លឹមសារមេរៀនឱ្យមានលក្ខណៈសម្បូរបែបក្នុងដំណើរការបង្រៀនសិស្ស- អនុវត្តន៍វិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនតាមគោលវិធី “សិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌល”  - បង្រៀនទ្រឹសី្តតិច ហើយនាំសិស្សចូលបន្ទប់អនុវត្តន៍កុំព្យូទ័រឱ្យបានច្រើន- រៀបចំបង្កើតកម្រងសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស គន្លឹះ និងច្បាស់លាស់លើ ទម្ងន់ ប្រភេទនៃសំណួរ និងទម្រង់បែបបទនៃ វិញ្ញាសា- អនុវត្តន៍ការវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស តាមរយៈគោលការណ៍៥០% លើសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ (កិច្ចការផ្ទះ ឬការ ស្រាវជ្រាវ២០%  សំណួរQUIZ ឬសំណួរផ្ទាល់មាត់ ឬពិនិត្យសៀវភៅ១០%  វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌១០% សកម្មភាពក្នុងថ្នាក់៥%  អវត្តមាន៥%)  និង៥០% លើការប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ  ប្រកបដោយភាពហ្មត់ចត់ តឹងរ៉ឹង និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ កម្រិតខ្ពស់បំផុត ធានាឱ្យបាននូវតម្លាភាព និង គុណភាពលើសមត្ថភាពពិតប្រាកដរបស់សិស្ស- តាមដានលើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស លើកទឹកចិត្ត  និងរិះរកគ្រប់មធ្យោបាយ     លើបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀន ដើម្បីជួយដល់សិស្សដែលរៀនខ្សោយក្នុងថ្នាក់- សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងបង្កើតនូវវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារខ)- កិច្ចការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសិស្សលើឯកសណ្ឋាន កាតសិស្ស សក់ ក្រចកដៃ ផាត់មុខ និងវត្តមានសិស្សជាប្រចាំ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន និងតុកៅអីក្នុងថ្នាក់ (គ្មានការគូសវាស) ជាប្រចាំរៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ចូលរួមសន្សំសំចៃទឹកភ្លើង និងការប្រើប្រាស់វាំងននក្នុងម៉ោងបង្រៀន បទបែនតាមស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែង- ចូលរួម និងសហការការងារសិក្សាធិការរបស់សិស្សជាមួយការិយាល័យសិក្សា អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសាលា ចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក តាមនីតិវិធីការងារ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងដែលមានចែង- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកគ)- ប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យ- ចូលរួមប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេស ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែ តាមក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស របស់ខ្លួនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងគោរពតាមនីតិវិធីការងារ ឬ/និង គោលការណ៍នៃការប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស- ចែករំលែកបទពិសោធន៍ សមត្ថភាព ផ្លាស់ប្តូរយោបល់ បង្ហាញហេតុផល/ ការយល់ឃើញ យ៉ាងសកម្មក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌពិភាក្សាដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍ គរុកោសល្យ។- មានរបាយការណ៍ និងកំណត់ហេតុប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសត្រឹមត្រូវ និងរក្សាទុកក្នុង សៀវភៅរដ្ឋបាលគ្រូ២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌- ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស- នៅឱ្យកៀកជាមួយនឹងសិស្ស ដើម្បីក្តាប់យកព័ត៌មាន ក៏ដូចជា ស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែងរបស់សិស្ស ព្រមទាំងបញ្ជូននូវព័ត៌មានទាំងឡាយណា ដែលជាបញ្ហាទៅកាន់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ  និងជំនួយឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា- ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ- ផ្តល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយនូវតម្លៃ និងសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្ស ដើម្បីឱ្យពួកគេអាច បញ្ចូលខ្លួន និងអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួននៅក្នុងសង្គម៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ ចងក្រង រក្សាទុក (Soft Coppy or/and Hard Coppy) លើវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស សម្ភារឧបទេស និងសម្ភារសិក្សា កិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងមេរៀនសង្ខេបបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ស្នាដៃសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវនានា (រួមទាំងសិស្ស ឬគ្រូខ្លួនឯង និងក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស)- ចូលរួមជាគណៈកម្មការប្រឡង  គណៈមេប្រយោគ  អនុរក្ស តាមការតែងតាំង/ ចាត់តាំងពីចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ បំណែងចែក កម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សា របស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែលត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍ) តាមខែនីមួយ- បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាសក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (DATA BASE) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការតាម កាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលសាលាបានកំណត់។- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក
Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្រៀន Microsoft Office and Design - មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...)- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតូចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
* ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Overview:
I.	To provide day-to-day management at Seascape Palace ensuring that the reputation of the company is maintained and enhanced.
II.	To ensure the following functions run efficiently run efficiently and compliance with Seascape’s SOPs:
1.	Guest In/Out
2.	Cleaning Management
3.	Maintenance
4.	Purchase Request
5.	Tenant Complaint
III.	To support Assistant GM and follow-up on any operation issues relating to tenants, suppliers or contractors.
IV.	To identify problem areas at Seascape Palace and recommend improvement plans to maximize the efficiency of site management.
V.	To deal with pest control, security and maintenance contractor.
VI.	To maintain good public relations with sub-contractors, visitors and tenants of the property.
VII.	To carry out any other duties as assigned by the Assistant GM / GM.
VIII.	To manage staff attendance to ensure that the daily operation go smoothly.

* Management Office:
1.	Regularly inspect all aspects of Seascape Palace.
2.	Weekly inspection reporting.
3.	Incident reporting.
4.	Organize, motivate, monitor and review the operations of all service contractors such as maintenance, security and pest control.
5.	Monitor and control housekeeping, maintenance and contractor staff; Attendance; Appearance; Attitude and; Performance.
6.	Ensure the building is run efficiently and cost effectively at all times and in a professional manner.

* Guest Check In/Out:
1.	Participate in move in/out process to ensure that everything goes smoothly.
2.	Take the photos of the unit and all appliance to make to statement to make sure that both sides agree with the condition of the unit and those appliances and let the relevant people, including the tenant, to sign off.
3.	Submit the statement and other relevant form signed by the tenants to the accountant for documentation
and reference to return security deposit back to the guest.
Job Requirement:
* Cleaning Management:
1.	Supervise cleaning operations to ensure the building is at all times a clean and hygienic environment.
2.	Patrolling and checking with daily checking reports.
3.	Receiving and checking all cleaning day reports.
4.	Check the laundry operation regularly to ensure that it operates smoothly.
5.	Staff performance reviews; attendance; appearance; attitude and; performance.
6.	Check the inventory and make request to fulfill it when necessary.

* Maintenance:
1.	Check the maintenance schedule to make sure it has been done as time line.
2.	Follow up all pending maintenance work.
3.	Check the defect report and find solutions to solve it as soon as possible.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  - Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example. - Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. - Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.  - Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent- Master degree is a plus - Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative - Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to employ technology - Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

hardcopy and softcopy formats.•	Liaise with quantity surveyors for the ordering and pricing of materials.•	overseeing the building work to make sure the works are executed according to the drawings and specifications set out the contract.•	develop and uphold project timelines and milestones.•	Providing leadership and direction to the contractors, subcontractors, specialist contractors and service providers teams on site, allowing them to proceed with, and supervise and manage their own teams effectively.•	Set clear goals and objectives, provide effective supervision, and manage performance of all contractors, subcontractors, specialist contractors and services providers to ensure efficient and safe construction operations as a whole on site.•	Be involved in the pre-qualification, selection, and on boarding of contractors, suppliers, vendors and other specialist contractors and service providers.•	Review and provide recommendations to the Cost Management and Procurement departments with regards to the technical aspects, and recommended terms and conditions for various construction related contracts, service agreements, and the like.•	Ensuring the project produces the specified objectives and results in the annual goals and workplan(s) to the required standard of quality and within the prescribed timelines and budget parameters.•	Recommending changes to any part of the construction works that is ongoing, or develop an alternate course of action if it appears that any part of the construction works is not proceeding on schedule, meeting its budget or is otherwise producing unsatisfactory results.
Job Requirement: •	Possessing a deep and thorough understanding of the real estate and construction industry, in particular in the field of civil and structural engineering. It is also expected that the Senior Site Engineer possesses broad technical knowledge that cuts across all the fields of civil and structural engineering.•	Strong technical knowledge pertaining to construction, architectural and engineering design criteria, construction sequencing and detailing, construction materials, methodologies and best practices.•	Knowing what is required in order for a particular project to be completed and has realistic expectations as far as meeting budgets and deadlines are concerned.•	Persistence and determination.•	Being able to use a high degree of initiative.•	Being thorough and pay attention to detail.•	Good independent and critical thinking, and problem solving skills.•	Be adaptable and possess a growth and agile mindset.•	Able to communicate effectively and is a good people manager•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.•	A proven ability to write project related documents and technical reports, and deliver presentations.•	Good mathematical skills, and can make accurate calculations quickly and easily.•	The ability to foster a sense of team spirit within the Projects department, and also foster good, cohesive and collaborative working relationships with other departments within the organisation.•	A reasonable level of fitness and mobility is required, as the work can be physically demanding. Site inspections may involve climbing ladders or visiting areas of sites where access is difficult. Appropriate safety equipment, such as protective boots and headgear, must be worn on site.•	The ability to develop strong network of industry relationships with industry partners, consultants, contractors, suppliers, vendors and other real estate bodies and agencies, and raise the profile and reputation of the organization while fostering good faith within the industry.•	The candidate for the position of the Senior Site Engineer (Civil & Structural) should have at least a Bachelor’s degree engineering, or related field. The candidate should have a minimum of  5-8 years of experience in the real estate or construction industry, preferably with 3-5 years in a management or supervisory role.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
Find potential clients to get the loan products and services in
their geographic areas or boundaries.
• Build a very good relationship with all levels of local authorities
to get their supports on loan document process.
• Analyze borrowers’ business plans and financial flows to get
more and more reliable data and information related to their
business income and family status.
• Assess and evaluate borrowers’ properties with the up to date
market price and check the legal ownership.
• Educate the credit rule and policies strictly to borrowers before
processing the loan documents.
• Set up the plan with Team Leader and OM for loan
disbursement projection as monthly, quarterly and annually
basis.
• Closely follow up the borrowers on their business change or
any problem then report to direct supervisor for taking early
action on time.
• Ensure the loan repayment with 100% and closely follow up.
• Work closely with marketing and product development officer
to research competitor business strength and weakness and
new product development.
• Make a daily report to Team Leader for consolidating all data to
make a daily client information and loan document submit
record to BM/ or OM and General Manager.
Job Requirement:
• BBA in management, finance and banking and accounting.
• Min 01 year experience in microfinance or banking operations.
• Age 20 to 35 years old.
• Cambodian male only

• Honesty, initiative, flexibility, high commitment and good inter-
personal and communication skills.

• Good working knowledge of computer (Ms. Office & Internet).
• Ability to effectively communicate in English and Khmer.
• Good understanding of Cambodian microfinance rules and
regulations, law on real estate and contract law.
• Team players with “CAN DO” attitude.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Golden Rice is a Cambodian rice miller and exporter international standard company,specialized in producing high-quality Cambodian Jasmine Rice product since 2009,equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and technology for drying, milling and packaging rice for export market, and winner of the Best Rice in the World award in 2012.
Beside its rice processing and exporting activities, Golden Rice is developing its own construction and engineering projects, such as industrial building construction, machinery & electrical installation, and R&D on agricultural engineering.

Job Description:
- Check Paddy/Rice and laboratory
- Take rice sample and check rice quality from Truck, Dryer,Milling ,Warehouse,Reprocess,Packing,Loading and Others
- Prepare rice sample and result after testing and sending to Management & others
- Research and develop QC Teams and follow up and coordinate with QC inspector
- Prepare all documents including, document for QC inspection, paddy and rice testing
- Keep QC records and reports to Supervisor
- Other tasks assigned by Supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in the field of Agronomist, or horticulture or other related fields
- 2 years Practical experience on rice producing or with QC
- Good knowledge of Post Harvest Management
- Good management, interpersonal and organization skills
- Flexible and can work under pressure
- Be able to use MS office,Email and write field report
- Good both writing and speaking English.

Job Description: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) will recruit 6 full time Field Data Assistants to work on the 3 rd TB National Prevalence Survey at the Clinical Research Group of the Epidemiology and Public Health Unit for a 7 months contract.* Main responsibilities:The Field Data Assistants will be based in Phnom Penh at the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge and will travel frequently to the provinces for the field implementation activities. He/she will act as liaison between the Fieldwork team and the Central Data Manager at the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC). He/she will be under the supervision of the Head of the Clinical Research Group.He/she will have:- In depth knowledge of data collection using Redcap application-  Experience in data quality check and quality control for field survey- Capacity to provide necessary assistant to use Redcap database- Experience in quality assurance systems for online and offline electronic data collection- In depth knowledge of data management and cleaning using Excel, REDCap, Stata and performing data management including automatic data control, queries release and solving, data quality check and control, data cleaning and extraction.- Experience in installing Redcap database on tablet and computer device and provide access to many difference users.- Fluency in both English (spoken and written)/ Khmer (spoken and written)- Excellent organizational skills and ability to handle multiple tasks in a dynamic environment- Ability to work effectively with various personalities and cultures- Capacity of quick integration in an active team with recognized expertise in international clinical trial management- Leadership skills development in problem-solving and field data management
Job Requirement: * Recruitment conditions:- Language required: Khmer and English- References required- Experience: at least 2 years in Field work and Data Management using Excel, REDCap, and Stata Application.- Available to start from January 16th, 2023* Candidate Profile:- Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Social Science and Health related fields- Good knowledge of Field Data Collection, Data Management and Cleaning- At least an Intermediate level of English language- Good computer knowledge- Good communication skills- Good at working as a team- A detail-oriented, well-organized, and dependable individualThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur- kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.* Deadline: January 6th, 2023.
