It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.Institut Pasteur du Cambodge is seeking for a suitable and qualified candidate to fill a position of Human Resources Assistant for one-year renewable contract.* Main responsibilities:- Assist all areas of human resource functions- Assists in recruiting process including job posting, scheduling interview, preparing related documents …- Maintain introductory process for new comers (set up safety door entry and attendance, print Staff ID, createemployee files and other requirements)- Update employee personal information and status change data- Response for leave management in HR System (verify daily leave request, generate monthly leave report …)- Control all staff attendance management, fingerprint and time sheet- Assist in payroll preparation by collecting relevant payroll element- Prepare different documents relate to HR policies and practices (decision, letter, certificate and others)- Communicate with Ministry of labor and vocational training (MoLVT)- Deal with staff concerns and requests regarding HR related issues, internal regulations, labour law …- Performs other tasks assigned by managers
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree in Human Resources/Business Administration or related field- At least two years’ experience in Human Resources field- References required- Full time position- Available to start as soon as possible* Candidate Profile:- Language required: English & Khmer (Knowledge of French will be a plus)- Excellent ability to adapt- Rigour and professional awareness- Be consistent, Confidential, Honest and Fair- Knowledgeable in all Cambodian Labor Law and Cambodia Employment Process- Good computer skill: Microsoft office (Excel, Word, Power Point), Internet and email (Outlook), Khmer Typing and HRIS- Problem solving and Interpersonal Communication Skill- Human Resources Capacity- Willing to learn and ability to work under pressure*Benefits- Working time: 7:30am to 11:30am and 1:30pm to 5:00pm- Working days: Monday to Friday (Public holiday follow MoLVT) - Accident and Health Insurance- NSSF (Occupational risk, Health care and Pension)- Severance pay 5% (FDC) and Seniority pay (UDC)- Khmer New Year Bonus and Pchum Ben BonusThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.* Deadline: January 6th, 2023.

job title: អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា
Job Description:
• ជួបពិភាក្សា និងណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាការសិក្សាខ្សោយ បញ្ហាចិត្តសាស្រ្ត បញ្ហាអាកប្បកិរិយា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យផ្សេងៗ។
• ផ្តល់ការប្រឹក្សា និងអន្តរាគមន៍ចំពោះសិស្សដែលងាយប្រឈមទៅនឹងបញ្ហា និងងាយរងគ្រោះ។
• ផ្តល់ការព្យាបាលផ្លូវចិត្តរយៈពេលខ្លី។
• ជួបពិភាក្សាជាមួយមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សអំពីបញ្ហាការសិក្សា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យរបស់សិស្ស។
• សម្របសម្រួលរវាងសិស្ស និងគ្រូ រវាងមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាលា នៅពេលពួកគាត់មានការត្អូញត្អែរ ឬមានការតវ៉ាផ្សេងៗ។
• ធ្វើផែនការ និងយុទ្ធនាការផ្សេងៗដើម្បីតម្រង់ទិស និងពង្រឹងវិន័យដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស (អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ)។
• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបន្ទុកថា្នក់ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ទក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។
• មើលសិស្សពេលចូលមកសាលា ចេញលេង និងចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
• ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ម្តងម្កាលពេលម៉ោងសិក្សា ដើម្បីមើលបញ្ហាសិស្ស និងគ្រូ។
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
• ធ្វើការណាត់ជួបមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទៅចាងហ្វាងដោយផ្ទាល់មាត់ជារៀងរាល់សប្តាហ៍។
Job Requirement: • បញ្ចប់សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រចិត្តវិទ្យា ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មិនគិតបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ តែមានការលើកទឹកចិត្តសម្រាប់អ្នកមានបទពិសោធ៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធ។• មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងដំណាក់កាលលូតលាស់របស់កុមារ និងជំទង់។• មានចំណេះដឹង និងមានក្រមសីលធម៌ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់។• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជា Word, Ms. Excel, Power Point, Internet និង Email។• មានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ។• ចេះគោរពពេលវេលា ស្មោះត្រង់ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ចេះបត់បែន និងអាចទទួលយកចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ។• មានជំនាញសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។• អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ និងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន។• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពរបស់សិស្ស ដោយធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ។• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ។• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជួយសង្គម និងវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្តាលខ្លីៗ។•​ មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អុីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
•	Set up monthly sales forecast plan and look for new projects assigned by Supervisor
•	Follow up prospective clients and taking care existing clients
•	Follow up and solving payment that got stuck
•	Process quotations and offers, sales contracts, and all official letters related to customers
•	Meet new clients to negotiate products, sales price and payment term and conditions
•	Follow up with clients during casting concrete and getting feedback from the customers 
•	Give technical advices to customers, to demonstrate and present the company’s products
•	Support sales admin to check daily concrete plan for the operation team.
•	Do daily weekly and monthly sale report and prepare monthly concrete supply services report 
•	Coordinate colleagues and other sections or departments in order to achieve group objectives
•	Be responsible for coordinating with all relevant departments
•	Undertake and perform other duties as assigned by Supervisor or Manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Sale & Marketing or related field.
•	Minimum 3 years’ experience in related field
•	Experience with ready mixed concrete experience is advantage
•	Good in Spoken and Written English
•	Be able to speak and write Chinese is advantage
•	Computer literacy (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…)
•	Team and goal-orientated; good attitude and inter-personal skills
•	Sound judgment and good at problem solving
•	Be creative, initiative and good at multitasking

Job Description: •	Ensure all lab results are released accurately on time.•	Manage and prepare workflow process to assure reliable results and pre-defined TAT.•	Validate and be responsible for all lab results •	Lab supervisor leads senior lab techs, lab staff and be lab manager interim when he/she is absent.Monitoring and improve the performance and productivity of Lab team. •	Develop adequate SOPs to determine the accuracy, precision, other performance of the method and bio-risk management.•	Create work environment that encourages all staff to participate actively in the growth of the business •	Supervise and be sure that all approved SOPs are applied properly.•	Ensure that all SOPs applied are compliant to the good practice in laboratory standard (ISO 15189) and supervise actively in corrective action plans •	Participate in a quality control and quality assurance program is established and maintained •	Manage, review and maintain workflow process, new methodologies and instrumentation to contribute for more efficient and effective operation.•	Assist in patient consultation and result interpretation. •	Lead and direct the development, communication and implementation of effective growth strategy and processes. •	Prepare safety and security initiative, plan improvement and streamline laboratory operational plan to achieve higher efficiency of the lab. •	Oversee and train lab technicians and assistants on the correct use of lab equipment and provide technical instructions to all staff•	Manage the company gross margin developments and take proactive or preventive measures to enhance overall profitability.•	Ensure all contracts or orders meet customer specific requirements and contractual scope. •	Supervise and participate in costing review and managing expenses in lab (reagent & storage, avoid contamination and damaging before shelf life of reagents), consumables, electricity. •	Assist with lab manager (interviewing, hiring, employee planning, evaluation staff competencies, performance reviews)•	Manage underperforming members of the lab team in cooperation with lab manager.•	Ensure that all information from bottom –up and vice versa have been transferred transparently and discussed freely across the company.•	Participate and develop informatics management system replying to customer satisfactions•	Control all Lab expenses to ensure that all expenses are accurately recorded and filed•	Respect for client’s and patient’s confidentiality.•	Work on other assignments which assign by lab manager.
Job Requirement: •	MD specialized in Medical Biology (with thesis is preference)•	1 years of laboratory and supervisory experience preferred•	Possess a strong supervisory aptitude with a proven track record of success in coordinating/participating in daily operations, tracking performance and process improvement.•	Proficiency with computers and basic office software (MS Word, Excel, Outlook) including experience with computer-based laboratory information system software.•	Ability to organize and prioritize multiple tasks/staffs simultaneously.•	Must possess excellent interpersonal communication skills•	Be able to lead and direct others•	Be able to develop strategic and action plan of laboratory•	Honest and High Commitment- Location : Koh Pich - Salary Rank : $800-$1000
Contact Info: Contact Information Sakura (Ms.) Operation Director 069211314 limhoung.charles.sturt@gmail.com Phnom Penh 1st Floor of Altos Hotel, St.148 Corner St.19, Sangkat Phsar Kandal II, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069211314

Job Description: •	Analyze samples and control the results in accordance with SOPs stated in the laboratory •	Responsible to provide TAT per pre-defined to customers with accurate results•	Perform daily maintenance, run QC or calibration with routine testing •	Check conformity of sample before testing•	Work with PPE (lab coats, safety gloves…)•	Help to create SOPs methods used and care for all materials and equipment in the laboratory •	Support the implementation of the laboratory maintenance (monitoring the repair, records implementation, procedures...)•	Manage equipment, consumables, and reagents to ensure that the process runs smoothly •	Apply on good laboratory management and LQMs •	Participate actively with line manager to meet ISO 15189 accreditation•	Assist actively in the growth of the business •	Participate actively in controlling expenses in lab (reagent & storage, avoid contamination and damaging before shelf life of reagents), consumables, electricity etc.•	Respect hygiene and safety role by keeping clean and well-organized of working place•	Ensure that all tests perform with quality, reliable and good services for all aspects of test performance included: pre-analytic, analytic and post analytic phases of testing•	Work on other assignments which assign by line manager•	Be flexible and rotate to works in any sections in laboratory when needed•	Respect for client’s and laboratory’s  confidentiality
Job Requirement: •	Degree in Medical Lab Technical school or university •	At least 1 year experiences in Laboratory job•	Professionally and high responsibility•	Be able to develop with lab machines and daily lab operation•	Good communication both verbal and electronic devices•	Computer competency (Word, Excel, Power point…) •	Honest and High Commitment•	Proficiency English- Khmer•	Willing to learn and tasked extra responsibility

job title: បុគ្គលិកកាន់ស្តុក
position: បុគ្គលិកកាន់ស្តុក
Job Description:
- ផ្គត់ផ្គង់សម្ភារ ដែលបានស្នើសុំ អោយទាន់ពេលទៅដល់ផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ
- ការរៀបចំស្តុក ឲ្យមានរបៀបរៀបរយ
- គ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- ធ្វើការបែងចែកសំភារៈទៅតាមផ្នែកនីមួយៗជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានការប្រើប្រស់សំភារះប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ផ្នែកនីមួយៗ
- ធ្វើសំណើរក្នុងការបញ្ជាទិញសំភារៈពេលជិតអស់ស្តុក
- រៀបចំឯកសារទាក់ទងនឹងការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក(ចេញ-ចូល)ឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងច្បាស់លាស់ដោយធានាថារាល់ ប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍មានឯកសារគ្រប់គ្រាន់
- ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ មកថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតនឹងត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement:
- ភេទស្រី ឬប្រុស
- កម្រិតអប់រំចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី១២ឡើង
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំឡើងផ្នែកស្តុក
- ត្រូវចេះកុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Office Word & Excel)
- មានឆន្ទះស្រលាញ់ការងារ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ តស៊ូព្យាយាម ស្មោះត្រង់ ភាពបត់បែន និងអាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធបាន
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   070 217 222 / 097 622 6873 dyraphang94@gmail.com Building No. 09, Street 163, Sangkat Olympic, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh 070 217 222 / 097 622 6873

job title: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញ
position: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញ
Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានបរិមាណស្តុកដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងមុនធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តបញ្ជាទិញ។
- រៀបចំផែនការបញ្ជាទិញទំនិញ ឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា ដើម្បីអាចឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់។
- ពិនិត្យតម្លៃ និងគុណភាព ឲ្យស្របតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់មុននឹងសម្រេចចិត្តបញ្ជាទិញ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសារបញ្ជាទិញ និងតម្លៃលើវិក័យប័ត្រ ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងច្បាស់លាស់។
- តាមដានការបញ្ជាទិញជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ ដោយរាប់បញ្ចូលទាំងថ្ងៃខែចូលទំនិញ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យបរិមាណ និងតម្លៃក្នុងប័ណ្ណបញ្ជាទិញជាមួយនឹងប័ណ្ណបញ្ជាលក់ ដោយត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយនឹងវិក័យប័ត្រ។
- ដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដូចជា ដឹកទំនិញខ្វះ ខុសតម្លៃ ខូចគុណភាព និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័។
- រៀបចំផែនការការបញ្ជាទិញជាកញ្ចប់។
- ឆែក និងសិក្សាតម្លៃលើទីផ្សារតាមរយៈអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ និងតាមរយៈបណ្តាញសង្គមផ្សេងៗ។
- សិក្សាតារាងតម្លៃ និងប្រៀបធៀបតម្លៃ អោយបានល្អិត មុនសម្រេចចិត្តបញ្ជាទិញ
- បង្កើត និងរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអ្នកលក់ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់។
- ចរចាតម្លៃជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់មុននឹងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ។
- វិភាគ និងកត់ចំណាំនូវអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលល្អសម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- ត្រូវសហការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធអោយបានល្អ

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកគណនីយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកគណនីយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
Job Description:
The main roles of the position will be responsible for developing and maintaining accounting principles, practices and procedures to ensure accurate and timely financial statements.
1. Managing the team to ensure that work is properly allocated and completed in a timely and accurate manner
2. Administering and monitoring the financial systems in order to ensure that the finances are maintained in an accurate and timely manner:
  o Preparing of trial Balance to Profit and Loss Account, Balance Sheet and statement of cash flow
  o Preparing and Consolidating of Accounts
  o Preparing of Tax Returns and Assessment
  o Monitoring and Control of Overheads
  o Arranging finance for the company as and when required
3. Inventory Management:
  o Arranging of supplies, monthly purchase reconciliation and consumption reconciliation
  o Monitoring of stock levels and prepare the monthly stock adjustments
4. Administering payroll in order to ensure that employees are paid in an accurate and timely manner:
  o Verifying timesheets and hours worked
  o Calculating employee salaries, Over Time, deductions and contributions
  o Preparing, reviewing and filing payroll summaries, journals and reports
  o Maintaining and issuing employee payment records
5. Credit control and costing:
  o Overseeing debt collection and debtors reconciliation
  o Overseeing costing analysis and control
6. Fixed Asset Management:
  o Arranging physical counts and monitoring of the purchases and the appropriate use of assets
  o Prepare schedules for accountant and administrator to review the existence, obsolete or broken, damaged or loss
  o Propose to management for a write-off
  o Assist Head of Department to determine and implement appropriate useful life, capitalization and depreciation policy
  o Assisting in arranging physical counts and monitoring of the purchases and the appropriate use of assets
7. Taxation: Ensure monthly tax declaration follow Cambodian Tax Law timely
  o Generate the monthly Salary including basic salary, OT calculation, other fringe benefit
  o Import all the general ledger to define purchase of service/product
  o Prepare the tax form softcopy including purchase book, sale book and salary list
  o Filling the tax forms and make the tax declarations
  o Prepare monthly tax reports to senior accounting officer before process tax declarations
  o Update new tax amendment from generation tax department of Cambodia
  o Provide tax training to perform tax processing timely
8. Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
1. BA/BS in Business with an emphasis in Accounting, CPA required; Master Degree in Accounting is a plus
2. At least five years prior supervisory experience in the financial reporting/general ledger area. Experience working in a construction company is preferred.
3. Understanding and experiencing of Sage Accounting Program, QuickBooks, Peachtree
4. Must have strong experience with Microsoft Excel, Access and Word, internet and email
5. Strong verbal and written communication skills.
6. Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meet deadlines required.
7. Good sound of verbal and written in English and Khmer
8. Being able to work in team and good time management, hard-working and initiative skill
9. Being honest, high commitment, good attitude, open-minded and work ethic.
10. Strong interpersonal, supervisory, Negotiation (mastered the art of persuasion), leadership, problem solving skills, and Ability Building Skill of team
11. Being highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and deadline;
12. Being goal oriented manner,
13. Being able to travel to sites/provinces

Job Description: - ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។- ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។- ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។- ការចូលរួម។- ទំនាក់ទំនង។
Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។- មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ - មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  - មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ - មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ - មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ - មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ
position: ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ
Job Description:
-	រៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រប្រចាំខែ និងការលក់ប្រចាំខែ
-	ផែនការការងារប្រចាំខែសម្រាប់ក្លឹប និងអាហារដ្ឋាន
-	តាមដាន និងជម្រុញការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃតាមផ្នែកនីមួយៗ
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាភ្ញៀវ បុគ្គលិក
-	តាមដានការធ្វើទីផ្សារតាមFacebook Page និងដំណើរការរបស់បុគ្គលិកដែលឆ្លើយតបទៅអតិថិជន
-	រៀបចំកម្មវិធីកំសាន្ត ប្រ៉ូម៉ូសិន ឬសកម្មភាពនានាដែលបង្កើនការទាក់ទាញអតិថិជន
-	រៀបចំលំហូរការងារតាមផ្នែក និងតួនាទីម្នាក់ដែលអាចជម្រុញការងារឲ្យរហូន
-	ធានាឲ្យបាននូវលទ្ធផលការងារល្អតាមផ្នែក
-	រៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រតំលៃដែលមានភាពទាក់ទាញ
-	ជម្រុង និងពង្រឹងគុណភាព រស់ជាតិ និងសេវាកម្មផ្នែកអាហារដ្ឋានអោយល្អ
-	លើកផែនការ និងរៀបចំកែលំអទីតាំងឲ្យកាន់តែមានភាពទាក់ទាញសម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ
-	ណែនាំ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់ផ្នែក
-	ទទួលភារៈកិច្ចនានាដែលអ្នកដឹកនាំប្រគល់ជូន
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទស្រី ឬប្រុស
-	កម្រិតអប់រំចាប់ពីបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ
-	ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងផ្នែករៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ គ្រប់គ្រងក្លឹបហាត់ប្រាណ ឬសណ្ឋាគារយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ
-	ចេះធ្វើការជាក្រុម រុះរាយរាក់ទាក់ រហ័សរហួន
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស និង/ឬ ភាសាចិន ទាំងសរសេរ និងនិយាយ
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms.Office Word & Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   070 217 222 / 097 622 6873 dyraphang94@gmail.com Building No. 09, Street 163, Sangkat Olympic, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh 070 217 222 / 097 622 6873

Job Description:
- រៀបចំចេញគំនិតរចនាបទដែលពោរពេញដោយសិល្បិ៍ៈច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្ពស់
- គូសរចនាបទការងារ (Banner, Poster, Brochures, Leaflets, Logos, Business Cards, Sticker, Cover, Folders ) បង្កើនការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ
- ចុះថតវីឌេអូ និងរូបភាពផ្ទាល់ជាប្រចាំ
- កាត់វីឌេអូសម្រាប់បម្រើការផ្នែកផ្សព្វផ្សាយ
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សាបណ្តាញMedia (Facebook Page, Telegram, YouTube) របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- រៀបចំប្រធានបទ និងរូបភាពទាក់ទាញសម្រាប់បង្ហោះក្នុងបណ្តាញសង្គមជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- រៀបចំផែនការចំណាយលើការBoost Page និងទូទាត់ចំណាយ
- រាយការណ៍ស្ថានភាពអតិថិជនសាកសួរព័ត៌មានតាមPage
- ទទួលភារៈកិច្ចនានាដែលអ្នកដឹកនាំប្រគល់ជូន
Job Requirement:
- ភេទស្រី ឬប្រុស
- កម្រិតអប់រំចាប់ពីបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ
- ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកាត់តរូបភាព វីឌេអូ និងឯកសារសម្រាប់ធ្វើសកម្មភាពទីផ្សារនានា
- ចេះធ្វើការជាក្រុម រុះរាយរាក់ទាក់ រហ័សរហួន
- ជំនាញកម្មវិធីកាត់តដូចជា Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Core Draw, Premiere, Aftereffect, Adobe Edition.
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ទាំងសរសេរ និងនិយាយ
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms.Office Word & Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email.

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់
Job Description:
តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈធានាសម្រេចឲ្យការលក់តាមផែនការ និងបាននូវការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មពិសេសសម្រាប់អតិថិជនចាប់តាំងពីស្គាល់ព្រីមៀរ៍ ផាក ផ្តើមរហូតក្រោយចុះកិច្ចសន្យាទិញលក់ ។
-	រៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រអនុវត្តតាមផែនការទីផ្សារ និងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រដែលបានដាក់ចេញ
-	សិក្សារពីគម្រោងនានា ដើម្បីរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ
-	តាមដានការផ្តល់ព័តមានរបស់បុគ្គលិក ចំពោះភ្ញៀវ
-	ផ្តួចផ្តើមគំនិត និងសហការជាមួយក្រុមផលិតកម្មផលិតស្ពត វីឌេអូខ្លី អំពីគម្រោង
-	ដឹកនាំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ និងភ្នាក់ងារលក់ ឲ្យសម្រចតាមផែនការលក់
-	រៀបចំ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ភ្ញៀវមកសួរព័ត៌មានរួមជាមួយនិងផែនការកែលំអ ដើម្បីរាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ ឬអគ្គនាយករង
-	រៀបចំស្ទៀបស្ទង់ និងប្រមូលមតិយោបល់ពីអតិថិជន
-	គ្រប់គ្រង និងប្រើប្រាស់គណនេយ្យFacebook និងលេខទូរស័ព្ទក្រុមហ៊ុន
-	ចែករំលែកព័ត៌មានលើFacebook Page កម្មវិធីប្រូម៉ូសិន ចូលទៅគ្រុបបណ្តាញទំនាក់ទំនងសង្គម ដូចជាតេឡេក្រាម និងហ្វេសប៊ូក
-	ធានាឲ្យមានក្រមសីលធម៌ អនាម័យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ រាល់ឧបករណ៍ និងសំភារៈនៅក្នុងការិយាល័យលក់
-	ណែនាំ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិក និងភ្នាក់ងារលក់
-	ធានាឲ្យមានឯកសារព័ត៌មានគ្រប់គ្រង់សម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ និងភ្នាក់ងារលក់

job title: បុគ្គលិករដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សជាន់ខ្ពស់
position: បុគ្គលិករដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សជាន់ខ្ពស់
Job Description:
តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ ធានាឲ្យមានរបៀបរៀបរយ ធនធានមនុស្សគ្រប់គ្រាន់ និងប្រព័ន្ធការងារច្បាស់លាស់ក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
ការងារស្នូល ឬចំប្បងៗ៖
o រៀបចំគោលការណ៍ សេចក្តីសម្រេច លិខិតជូនដំណឹង ផ្សេងៗ
o ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់កម្រិតអោយទាន់ពេលវេលា
o រៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឍនធនធានមនុស្ស
o ធានាឲ្យបាននូវច្បាប់ទំលាប់ សោព័ណ្ឌភាព និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ជាប្រចាំ
o រៀបចំផែនសកម្មភាព និងការចំណាយប្រចាំខែរបស់ផ្នែក របាយការណ៍ការងារប្រចាំខែដែលសម្រេចបានជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
o តាមដានការបំពេញការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់បុគ្គលិក
o រៀបចំចាត់ចែង និងផ្គត់ផ្គង់បរិក្ខា និងរបស់របរប្រើប្រាស់សម្រាប់ការិយាល័យប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
o រៀបចំរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធក្រុមហ៊ុន តួនាទីភារៈ និងលំហូរការងារក្រុមហ៊ុន
o រៀបចំវាយតម្លៃបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
o រៀបចំប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំខែ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ
o រៀបចំគោលការណ៍គ្រប់គ្រងធនធានមនុស្ស
o ពង្រឹងការអនុវត្តច្បាប់ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន
ការងារបន្ថែម៖
o ស្វែងរក និងប្រៀបធៀបតារាងតំលៃលំអិតរបស់អ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
o ទទួលភារៈកិច្ចនានាដែលអ្នកដឹកនាំប្រគល់ជូន
Job Requirement:
o ភេទប្រុស ឬស្រី
o កម្រិតបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង
o ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលនិងធនធានមនុស្ស លើវិស័យសណ្ឋាគារ ក្លឹបហាត់ប្រាណ
o ចេះធ្វើការជាក្រុម មានសមត្ថភាពលើការបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូល ល្អិតល្អន់ អត់ធ្មត់ តស៊ូ រុះរាយរាក់ទាក់ រហ័សរហួន
o ចេះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយអតិថិជន
o ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសខ្លះទាំងសរសេរ និងនិយាយ
o អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms.Office Word & Excel, Quick book, Internet and Email.

Job Description: Job Description:1. Plan, organize, and provide instruction in English that are aligned with Cambridge curriculum and school standards to meet the varied learning styles, abilities, and needs of students.2. Develop and deliver lesson plans that utilize a broad range of appropriate teaching techniques and strategies.3. Address all aspects of communication through appropriate instruction that develops each student’s knowledge and abilities in appropriate grade levels and subjects.4. Administer academic assessments for the purpose of evaluating student progress for meeting academic learning targets and progress in knowledge acquisition.5. Establish and maintain standards of student behavior required to run an orderly and productive classroom environment.6. Oversee assigned out-of-classroom activities during the school day, as needed.7. Performs other duties as may be assigned by the principal or superintendent.Requirements:1. Bachelor's degree or above in Education, English, or the relevant subjects.2. Teacher's license holder is preferred.3. At least 2 years of teaching experience in Cambridge IGCSE.4. Must possess excellent interpersonal communication and expression skills.If you think your qualifications meet above requirements, kindly drop a cover letter, and updated CV attached with current photo (4x6) to New Gateway International School. Address: No 2, St. 156-211, Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Alternatively send an e-mail with attached relevant documents/qualification to the email below.

Job Description:
- Organize and assist to implement student orientation grade and registration activities related to Chinese placement test
- Prepare master plan and curriculum for Khmer Department
- Cooperate with other team members to assist in the development in establishment of school goals and objectives and the planning of the school instructional program
- Coordinate and influence program of English department
- Create and maintain project documentation, such as meeting minutes, agendas, risks, issue, and change control procedure and log
- Distribute all project document to key team members and upload onto project’s repository system
- Work with key team members, vice principal, principal and president in planning and developing Khmer program/project work plans, budgets, implementation plans contingency plan, and business plan
- Monitor deliverable due from team member and follow-up with assigned team members
- Access Khmer program and write report 
- Create training and workshop for Khmer teachers 
- Substitute classes when teachers are absent
- Plan for growth of the school and organize the children’s test template
- Develop outstanding reputation and outcome for the school
- Ensure and organize the children discipline committee and counselling
- Ensure integrity/honesty to the school
- Ensure good working productivity and improve quality of the school
- Provide direction of staff and teachers in implementing goals and objectives 
- Check teacher’s lesson plans
- Observe teachers and give feedback
- Assist and disseminate information about school’s disciplinary policies and procedure to parents, children and the community
- Supervise and maintain services and use of resources to supplement the school program
- Display the highest ethical and professional behaviour and standards when working with children, teachers and parents
- Serve as a role model for children, teachers and staff
- Notify the vice principal where there is evidence of abuse, violence, child negligence, severe medical and social condition
- Keep the vice principal informed about any employee or teacher not meeting the contractual agreement
- Develop clearly understood procedure and provide regular drills to comply with the administration policies
- Maintain a master schedule to be posted for all teachers and keep tracking all schedule and monitor all program.
- Establish a schedule and procedures for supervision of children during non-classroom activities
Job Requirement:
Requirement:

- At Least hold a Bachelor Degree in Education or related field

- At least 3-year experience with Education Management

-Male/Female, age 25-45

- Be a team player

- Manage to do multi-tasks 

- Good interpersonal skills

- Computer Application (Microsoft Office,Powerpoint...)

Financial data organization work4-Clearing and deducting personal arrears. Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Unit Handover
•  Inspect the condo units are handed over to customers on time and in good quality
•  Support and coordinate with smooth handover of units and on time
•  Arrange appointment with unit owner for handover schedule
•  Work closely within and across department to deal with customer complaints related to handover and defect modification

Customer Services
•  Welcome and Greeting with customer services manner 
•  Respond to phone call, message, or email from customers
•  Provide information and explanation of the condo rules, policies and other information to unit owner, residents and clients
•  Receive and respond to any complaints, requests and needs  
•  Provide good relationship and communication with owner, residents, clients, and teams
•  Support in deliver invoices and payment collection

•  Support sending memo or announcement to unit owner, residents and related parties
•  Manage the mail room 
•  Be the first point of contact for pavilion reservation

Operations

•  Support daily operations such as filling forms, move-in coordination

•  To be reachable in emergency incidents

Job Requirement:
•  Background with handover condo units and residential management
•  A highly organized, deadline detailed oriented professional with proven track record of insightful analysis to management
•  Good business acumen and analyze
•  Intermediate to advanced proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook).

Job Description: - រៀបចំកម្មវិធីបង្រៀនប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។- រៀបចំរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់(កិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន សម្រង់អត្ថបទប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ )ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់។- កំណត់សម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់សម្រាប់ការរៀនដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។- រៀបចំស្នាដៃសិស្សសម្រាប់ចូលរួមតាំងពិព័រណ៌ស្នាដៃសិស្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។- រៀបចំវិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស។- រៀបចំលទ្ធផលប្រឡង និងប្រគល់ជូនលេខាធិការកម្មវិធីសិក្សាទៅតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។- អនុវត្តបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%។- ចូលរួមរាល់គ្រប់សកម្មភាពសាលា។- បង្រៀនសិស្សឱ្យមានគុណភាព និងវិន័យ។- រៀបចំថ្នាក់រៀនឱ្យមានសោភ័ណភាព និងអនាម័យ។- ចូលរូមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់សាលា។- ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។- ជួយមើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង ពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ និងក្នុងថ្នាក់រៀន។រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆមាស និងប្រគល់ជូនមកចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទៅតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។
Job Requirement: - មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល។- គោរពម៉ោងការងារ។- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។- ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ។- ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់។- មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន។- មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: - ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា- ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់- អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%- ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...- គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%- ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា- ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់- សរសេររកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ- ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា - សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ- អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ សិស្សល្អ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ- ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ- ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស- គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%- បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន- បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព- ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន- សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងគ្រូបង្គោល និងគ្រូជំនួយ និងក្រុមការងារ- ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...- អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%- ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា- ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន- បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា- គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%៕
Job Requirement: - មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល- គោរពម៉ោងការងារ- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ- ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ- ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់- មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន- មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ - មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
•	Ensure to maximize sales all kinds of SKU at the assign territories from time to time 
•	Join training on Product knowledge/Customer service with PE leader regularly 
•	Daily arrange product display as per assign and proper clean the area.
•	Be able to identify customer need clearly before proposing any products.
•	Provide excellence customer service, be professionalism and seek to improve the problem solving and negotiation skill from time to time.
•	Learn how to demonstrate all SKU by following Leader guideline and implement Weekly/Monthly products DEMO as per schedule 100% with approval budget.
•	Strictly follow PE roster plan accurately.
•	Prepare and manage stock at the responsible area including POSM.
•	Submit accurate Sale/Stock report to Leader on time and checking on stock in and out regularly comparing to Daily Sales
•	Monitoring the progress of work and producing status reports Daily, Weekly, Monthly.
•	Adheres to all company policies, procedures and business ethics codes 
•	Other tasks may assign by Team Leader
Job Requirement: •	Priority to the candidate has a location address near (Aeon Mall I and Macro Supermarket)•	Holding High School or obtaining a Bachelor degree is a plus •	Good at communication and Problem Solving with customers•	Be able to communicate with the customer in English/Chinese is a plus•	Maintain professional internal and external relationships that meet company core values.
Company Profile:
We import quality equipment & product all over the world to ensure you are only using the best. We also provide reliable after sales services to support you as you start your coffee business journey.

 Founded in 2009, KOFI is one of the largest company which distributes Espresso coffee, Espresso coffee machine, Syrup and other related coffee accessories in Cambodia. Our main priority is to focus on quality services, professionalism and integrity.

 We have expanded ourselves with 4 showrooms in difference provinces to better serve our customer all over Cambodia. With full coverage services in Phnom Penh, SiemReap, Sihanouk Vile and Battambang.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់
Job Description:
តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ ស្វាគមន៍ និងណែនាំភ្ញៀវប្រកបដោយទំនុកចិត្ត និងភាពទាក់ទាញ។ ។
-	រៀបចំឯកសារ (លិខិតប័ណ្ណ និងដំណើរការទិញលក់) សម្រាប់ជូនអតិថិជន
-	ផ្តល់ព័តមានជូនភ្ញៀវផ្ទាល់ និងតាមទូរស័ព្ទ
-	រៀបចំ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ភ្ញៀវមកសួរព័ត៌មានប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
-	ទំនាក់ទំនង និងតាមដានការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយ
-	រៀបចំស្ទៀបស្ទង់ និងប្រមូលមតិយោបល់ពីអតិថិជន
-	គ្រប់គ្រង និងប្រើប្រាស់គណនេយ្យFacebook ក្រុមហ៊ុន ដោយសកម្មរាល់ថ្ងៃ
-	ចែករំលែកព័ត៌មានលើFacebook Page កម្មវិធីប្រូម៉ូសិន ចូលទៅគ្រុបបណ្តាញទំនាក់ទំនងសង្គម ដូចជាតេឡេក្រាម និងហ្វេសប៊ូក
-	រៀបចំ និងថែរក្សារអនាម័យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ រាល់ឧបករណ៍ និងសំភារៈនៅក្នុងការិយាល័យលក់
-	ព្យាយាមរក្សា និងបង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន
-	ស្វែងរកបញ្ជីឈ្មោះ និងលេខទូរស័ព្ទពីស្ថាប័នពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីណែនាំអំពីគ្រោង
-	សហការណ៍ជាមួយក្រុមភ្នាក់ងារលក់ និងផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅវិញទៅមក
-	ទទួលភារៈកិច្ចនានាដែលអ្នកដឹកនាំប្រគល់ជូន
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទស្រី ឬប្រុស
-	កម្រិតអប់រំចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី១២ឡើង
-	ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកសេវាកម្មទទួអតិថិជន លើគម្រោងបុរី ដីឡូតិ៍
-	ធ្លាបមានបទពិសោធន៍លើការផ្តល់ព័ត៌មាន លើកទូរស័ព្ទ និងLive ហ្វេសប៊ូក
-	ចេះធ្វើការជាក្រុម រុះរាយរាក់ទាក់ រហ័សរហួន
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស និង/ឬ ភាសាចិនខ្លះ ទាំងសរសេរ និងនិយាយ
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms.Office Word & Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email.

job title: គ្រូបង្គោលក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូបង្គោលក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា
Job Description:

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា- ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់- អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%- ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...- គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%- ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា- ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់- សរសេររកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ- ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា - សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ- អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ សិស្សល្អ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ- ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ- ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស- គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%- បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន- បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព- ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន- សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងគ្រូបង្គោល និងគ្រូជំនួយ និងក្រុមការងារ- ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...- អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%- ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា- ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន- បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា- គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%៕

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
- Works directly with team to design, organize, purge, and display, including home stores, showrooms, and customer residences.
- Responsible for total store support display recovery directed by Visual Lead, 
- Receiving accessories, placement of new products.
- Creating floor plan – 2D or 3D, including store’s layout plan, customer demands, product focus, and flexibility to travel to service multiple projects.
- Work with the store Manager, store staff in determining specific visual needs, such as fixtures, images, and point of sale materials for the store.
- Mentor store staff on merchandising basics, and assist in communicating the company’s visual merchandising standards.
- Perform basic daily, weekly, and monthly total store recovery.
- Maintain reliable attendance, and adheres to work schedule, or deadline.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor of Degree of Interior Design or other related fields.
- Two-year experience in interior design is a plus.
- Be able to walk, stand, crouch, knee land stretch to reach object.
- Computer Skills: Auto Cad 2D and 3D, Sketch up, and Photoshop
- Be able to communicate in English.
- Be creative an
- pressure to meet the deadline.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: Taisun Group has embarked on a Transformation journey to deliver on its promise of profitable, sustainable growth. To realize its compass strategy of doubling the size of the business while reducing its inefficiencies, Taisun wants to embark on a new role to anchor its profitable growth agenda through proper business control and strengthen with Net Revenue Management (NRM) discipline and program. NRM (Net Revenue Management) is a new but systematic approach to defining our strategic pricing, our price-pack architecture, our promotions and our trade terms structure with the aim of driving profitable growth. For 2023 and beyond, business control and NRM discipline have been identified as one of our core strategic growth enablers.As Commercial Business Controller you are responsible to ensure proper accounting and booking of all Commercial utilization of expenses in Sales and Marketing Expense line and for creating growth strategies for Winsun through portfolio optimization, pricing, active mix management, trade spend utilization and promotional spend excellence. You will collaborate and act as a crucial link between the Marketing, Sales, and Finance teams throughout the process to ensure strategy alignment and execution. As Commercial Business Controller you will be responsible for the following tasks:     1.	Review, compile & evaluate monthly forecast submission from heads of channel, trade & marketing, and submission of consolidated commercial business forecast to various department ie planner & finance     2.	Prepare various analysis report include commercial PL by channels, regions & brand     3.	Review, monitor & tracking of trade & marketing expense, including accruals & actual payment management to avoid surprises in under or over-accruals     4.	Conduct in-depth portfolio assessments to set brand objectives, identify price realization gaps, highlight white spaces and ensure price-pack execution to support the brand and portfolio strategy     5.	Optimize channel-customer / pack mix to accelerate profitable growth for Taisun and customers     6.	Evaluate consumer promotional strategies including alignment with brand objectives, promotional responsiveness as well as ROI profile. Recommend an optimal promotion strategy.      7.	Identify conclusions through in-depth analysis, using financial tools/frameworks and methodologies which will be developed over time for this role     8.	Develop methodologies in order to perform financial analyses and scenario development that will be the base for portfolio pricing simulations and white space launches     9.	Collaborate and act as a crucial link between the Marketing, Customer and Finance teams throughout the NRM process to ensure strategy alignment and execution    10.	Responsible for relationship management with key stakeholders in Modern Trade
Job Requirement: You have good appreciation of marketing, finance and operations and strong problem-solving and analytical skills. You have a strong drive to excel, at all times, within a team and as an individual. You are an achiever with brainpower and stamina to develop and drive in-depth strategic projects. Furthermore, you are a great team player, giving respect and stimulating an environment of enthusiasm.I. Education/Academic Qualifications Degree in Finance, Business, and/or relevant discipline from a notable university.II. Functional knowledge/Technical skillsWhat You’ll Need To Succeed     1.	Strong FMCG experience     2.	Strong analytical skills     3.	Bachelor's or Master’s degree in business           or marketing     4.	2+ years of experience in marketing,      finance, sales or consulting     5.	Fluent English skills     6.	Excellent senior stakeholder management skills     7.	Ability to operate independentlyIII. Professional/Technical Qualifications & LicenseIV. Work Experience     At least 2 years Financing experience in the FMCG industry- Business Environment   I. Key Contacts:    1. Commercial Teams in Cambodia and other geographies within Taisun Group, R&D Team and Up and Downstream Supply Chain including Plant & Manufacturing    2  External：Distributors, Key Accounts & Key decision makers in each channels ( including E-Commerce) II. Work condition:Working Hours:  8 hours / 6 daysWorking Condition: OfficeTravel is required from time to time.* Send your CV and Cover Letter to our email : recruitment@winsuncambodia.com and CC Email to  ponlok.noeun@taisun.com.vn For more information, you may contact us via phone line: 010 756 508 | 015 337 375​
Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: - Manage customer service support unit and run day to day   functions as per plan.- Review, assess, design, simplify and drive continuous   improvement of the service process, policy, SLA, protocol,   and standards via Cross collaboration with various   departments such as operations, commercial, product, customer   service, Finance, Dispute and marketing to ensure compliance   adherence and customer centric service delivery.- Act as a single point of contact from Customer experience to   acquire, receive, manage, and distribute all relevant   information from whole Wing division and facilitate to   distribute on time to the customer experience division- Review, design, roll out and manage customer service systems   to ensure right and sufficient resources are in place and   operating effectively to run day to day operations and meet   business goals.- QA-Assessment for all service touch points of both   traditional and digital to ensure high service quality is   provided by frontline staffs through post call monitoring,   spy call, mystery shopping, and side by side monitoring- Provide regular intelligence reports with comprehensive   impact analysis and recommendations to enhance overall   customer experience.- Conduct training need analysis (TNA), identify gap and/or   further advancement, prepare training plan and execute   training for the whole department.- Work with department head and line manager to calibrate   monitoring processes and results- Research and recommend department head for implementation of   new and modern customer service technology, service delivery   method/approach and processes.- Interview, hire new employees and follow strong retention   practice.

- Good presentation skill

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
** Objectives of the Position
To proactively develop and execute all sales & marketing activities in order to accelerate the sales of TOA’s solutions (products and services), as well as to maintain customer’s satisfaction at the top level. Develop new client network and new markets with existing products portfolio. Be
a TOA representative, to introduce new products and solutions to all customers, influencers and stakeholders in a professional manner.

** Main Tasks
• Proactive Sales & Marketing – Identify potential key clients & customers and develop strong
working relationship in order to obtain upstream information on current and upcoming projects as
well as close sales.
• Technical Development – Work closely with clients & customers and introduce TOA products
and services to the projects professionally.
• Corporate Image – To work closely with “Marketing Team” on the corporate image to be
presented to the market through brochures, advertisements, newsletters, events, etc.
• Corporate Profile – Increase the awareness of TOA products and services in the market
through provide presentation, demonstration, coordination at project site, conferences,
exhibitions, etc.
• Product Development – To work closely with the “Technical Teams” to support development
and innovation of new products and services to meet market demands.
• Analysis – Conducts analysis of market, customers, competition, latest trends and product
development opportunities.
• Liaison – Be the ambassador of the company in the construction industry. Represent the
company in various trade forums, customer groups, influencer groups and standards
development authorities.
• Customer Satisfaction – Be a focal point to provide all supports and services beyond
customer’s expectation in order to maximize customer satisfaction.
Job Requirement:
• Education: Bachelor degree, major in civil engineering, architecture, marketing or relevant fields.
• Working Experience: minimum 5 years in construction or relevant industries.
• Knowledge of computer program (MS Office, Outlook, Internet, Email).
• Willing to learn attitude and quick learner.
• Motivated to learn new skills and technologies.
• Being proactive, flexible, can travel and stay overnight in other provinces.
• Good interpersonal skill and teamwork mind set.
• Language: Proficient in Khmer & English. Chinese would be a plus. 

Application should include a resume, accompanied by a covering letter outlining the candidate’s interest in suitability for the position. Applications will be reviewed and processed on a rolling basis and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Company Profile: TOA is the leader of innovative and decorative paint manufacturer in South East Asia who offers and supplies a variety of demand by a plenty innovative painting solution system in both household and industrial market. More than 50 years of paint business, our products continue to gain an increasing share of the highly competitive in both international market and domestic sales due to our premium product quality and high service level.  With high standard and strong product portfolio, TOA has been growing faster than the industry average. We draw our strengths from the new products, best-managed behavior, and also strong sales force. During the past ten years, TOA has expanded its business to Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Malaysia and Indonesia. TOA considers the importance of the human capital and equality of opportunity. Our employees will be offered an attractive salary and benefits package as well as career and learning development.

job title: បុគ្គលិករដ្ឋបាលសាលារៀន
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: បុគ្គលិករដ្ឋបាលសាលារៀន
Job Description:
• ទទួលបន្ចុកចុះឈ្មោះសិស្សសុំចូលរៀនគ្រប់កម្រិតនៅរៀងរាល់ដើមឆ្នាំសិក្សា
• បញ្ចូលព័ត៌មានសិស្សទៅក្នុង Database AIS system និងបោះត្រាពាក្យសុំចូលរៀន
• ទទួលបន្ទុករៀបចំ Folder សិស្សតាមកម្រិតថ្នាក់នីមួយៗ
• ទទួលបន្ទុកចុះអត្តលេខសិស្សថ្មី និងសិស្សឆ្លងភូមិសិក្សាក្នុងសៀវភៅបញ្ជីអត្តលេខ
• ទទួលបន្ទុកទទួលព័ត៌មានតាមរយៈទូរសព្ទ និងហៅទូរសព្ទចេញទៅមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស
• ទទួលបន្ទុកការងារពិន្ទុសិស្សថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី១២
• ទទួលបន្ទុករៀបចំបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្សថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សារហូតដល់ទី១២ សម្រាប់បិទផ្សាយការប្រកួតប្រជែងផ្សេងៗ
• ទទួលបន្ទុករៀបចំបញ្ជីស្រង់វត្តមានសិស្សតាមថ្នាក់គោល បញ្ជីវត្តមានភាសាអង់គ្លេសសិស្សតាមកម្រិត បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សតាមថ្នាក់ជំនាញ
• ទទួលបន្ទុក Auto call ឬផ្ញើសារជាសំឡេងទៅមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• ទទួលបន្ទុករៀបចំបញ្ជីរាយនាមសិស្ស និងប្លង់ទីតាំងសម្រាប់ដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សាសម្រាប់សិស្សថ្នាក់ក្រោម មត្តេយ្យ ដល់ទី១២
• ទទួលបន្ទុកធ្វើអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៩ និងទី១២ ដើម្បីប្រឡងថ្នាក់ជាតិ
• ទទួលបន្ទុកប្រចាំការមើលសិស្សបំប៉នពេលយប់ (សិស្សបង់ប្រាក់) ថ្នាក់ទី១ ដល់ទី១២
• ទទួលបន្ទុកបូកសរុបទិន្នន័យសិស្សប្រចាំខែ ឆមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• គ្រប់គ្រងការងារបញ្ជីសារពើភណ្ឌ
• គ្រប់គ្រងការងារផ្គត់ផ្គង់សម្ភារបង្រៀន និងរៀន (Supply) ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• ការងារថតចម្លងវិញ្ញាសា ឯកសារ (Copy) សិស្ស គ្រូ និងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• ការងារឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលសិស្សក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា
• ការងារឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលសិស្សមធ្យមសិក្សា
• ការងារបណ្ណសរសើរសិស្សគ្រប់កម្រិតថ្នាក់
• ការងារបណ្ណសរសើរគ្រូ និងបុគ្គលិក
• សំណុំពាក្យស្នើសុំសិទ្ធិប្រឡងសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ
• រៀបចំបញ្ចូលព័ត៌មានសិស្សទៅក្នុង Database បេក្ខភាពប្រឡងថ្នាក់ទី៩ និង១២
• រៀបចំអាហារូបករណ៍សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី១២
• រៀបចំទូដាក់ឯកសារគ្រូ (Locker)
• រៀបចំទូដាក់ឯកសារ និងសម្ភារសិក្សាសិស្ស
• ពិនិត្យសៀវភៅសិក្ខាគារិកសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៤ ដល់ទី១២
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍គ្រូប្រចាំពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• ការងារសម្រង់មតិសិស្ស
• ការងារប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស
• ការងារប្រឡងសងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស
• ការងារសិស្សប្រឡងឡើងថ្នាក់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• ការងារចងក្រងរក្សាទុកនូវឯកសារកម្មវិធីសាលារៀន និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗទៀត
• សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការិយាល័យសិក្សា
Job Requirement: • បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃស្មើ• មានចំណេះដឹងខាងផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាប្រើប្រាស់បានលើកម្មវិធី៖ Words, Ms. Excels, Internet, Email• មានសមត្ថភាពប្រឹក្សាយោបល់និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស• ស្គាល់អំពីសិទ្ធិកុមារ និងសិទ្ធិមនុស្ស• មានចំណេះដឹងអាចប្រើការបានលើភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ឆ្លងកាត់ការងាររដ្ឋបាលយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖ •  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
●	Daily management of customer complaint and field operation technical inquiries
●	Managing weekly work plan of technical assistant team (TA) to ensure the after-sale support system deliver the SLAs & operational KPIs 
●	Ensuring best customer experiences through TA’s visit and after-sale services
●	Working with external contractor for timely resolving of tier 2- 3 complaint units
●	Monthly accessories & components quality inspection
●	Supervision of weekly termination process
●	Technical verification & testing for new product & suppliers 
●	Reporting on quarterly product performance & quality assessment 
●	Monthly reporting to the management on S&E team progress and achievement
